10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"These Are the Levi’s That Could Be the Next It Jeans","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/d75d-5J1FX4/new-levis-jeans","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598299308259-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>They can have their pumpkin spice lattes—to me, nothing says fall like a fresh, new pair of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=5j4epPjhyggf9P_RJxtPlzxX70w-cVCyGtnN98tq0Hg72vKAl_mlKoOOlry-xtS_1JXQiirETte2\" target=\"_blank\">Levi's</a>. To be honest, there have been times over the past few months in which I felt like sweatpants and sweatshorts were glued to my body and I'd no longer be able to tolerate the feeling of anything but jersey knit, but alas, I'm ready to jam my legs into a pair of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-fall-basics-for-jeans\" target=\"_blank\">jeans</a> again, believe it or not. And luckily, most of the Levi's pairs that I've tried are surprisingly <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-comfortable-jeans\" target=\"_blank\">comfortable</a>—even the 100% cotton ones.</p><p>So, to get to the point here… I'm in the market for a new pair to celebrate my reuniting with them. In my research, I came across so many cool new pairs that I simply couldn't <em>not</em> share them. Given all the past Levi's styles that have gone viral (i.e. Wedgies, Ribcage, and Dad to name a few), I've been wondering what that next pair to go big will be. Well folks, I have found several specific contenders, some of which are variations on previous It styles, some of which are brand new. Keep scrolling to shop your next pair before they sell out.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302070015-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This subtle flared style is perfect for pairing with ankle boots, and they complement so many fall trends.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302220766-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I simply can't decide, so I guess I'm getting both washes. (Can you blame me?)</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302086200-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Long and loose jeans have a good chance at replacing skinny jeans this fall and winter, and I'd gladly embrace the trend with this pair.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302186970-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>It's hard to resist this old favorite in a new wash, which is a great one when you're seeking a little polish as far as your outfit is concerned.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598306059524-main.900x1025uc.jpg\"><figcaption>There's never been a better time than 2020 to go back to the tried-and-true basics.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302210391-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I actually have yet to try the famous Levi's Ribcage Jeans, but this pair is convincing me that I might have to now.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598303790079-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Another new Ribcage wash that will make you an instant fan of the style.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598303834778-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>These clearly aren't jeans, but I'm convinced that they'll become a cult favorite.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598304376818-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>AKA how to get a pair of vintage(-looking) jeans without going to a vintage story and trying on dozens of pairs, followed by a trip to the tailor.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598304394879-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Distressed jeans are one of the season's biggest trends, and I can't think of a better way to give it a try than with this chic, subtle pair.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598305899208-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption>These are so many things at once—classic, on-trend, elevated, cool. </figcaption></figure></p><p><em>Next up, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-inseam-length-jeans\" target=\"_blank\">how to find the best denim inseam for your height</a>.</em></p><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/d75d-5J1FX4\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Mon, 24 Aug 2020 22:41:00 +0000","feedId":12840,"bgimg":"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598299289673-promo.800x0uc.jpg","linkMd5":"44385a8f2b2337a51a87a0e5b67bf73c","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn47@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-35-837_b2eda51486d611f8.webp","destWidth":700,"destHeight":933,"sourceBytes":161085,"destBytes":105194,"author":"Allyson Payer","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598299308259-main.1200x900uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn22@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-32-013_2467d233fc9f8467.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302070015-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn75@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-13-57-825_52ae091a9fd0d0d3.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302220766-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn20@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-47-790_d7a5e508d530e337.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302086200-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn33@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-37-037_826d0db30b6c2730.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302186970-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn43@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-55-018_96e2e41370890591.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598306059524-main.900x1025uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn9@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-14-32-971_c9026d727bf94d8e.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598302210391-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn25@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-23-014_ba33943407cd8d0b.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598303790079-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn86@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-18-395_15e3ce60cbc50fa0.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598303834778-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn3@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-14-11-683_89e0da5d8651d3fe.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598304376818-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn90@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-13-11-116_2244aea8fb57e134.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598304394879-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn42@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-43-781_80a2331b68df7470.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288779/new-levis-jeans-288779-1598305899208-main.960x1450uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn34@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-33-011_7d67792a519928f2.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/d75d-5J1FX4":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn25@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-13-933_a79b7ceb52890c3d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581860},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"How to Perfect 2020's Biggest Nail Trend at Home With (Basically) No Skills","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/aRqIrXhS2P8/french-nail-designs","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037685747-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>ICYMI—<a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/french-manicure-history\" target=\"_blank\">the French manicure</a> has been the comeback kid of 2020. Previously considered outdated, frumpy, and old-fashioned, French-inspired nail designs began their revenge ascent back in 2019, and despite some raised eyebrows, the trend <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/spring-beauty-trend-report-2020\" target=\"_blank\">shows no sign of slowing down</a>. (And we're so not complaining!)</p><p>Not only is the traditional white Frech manicure overtaking our Instagram feeds and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-nails-designs-on-instagram\" target=\"_blank\">nail-dusted inspiration boards</a>, but countless whimsical, unexpected, and super-fresh takes on the trend are also popping up. The sky is the limit when it comes to French nail designs—not only can you switch up your tip shade of choice (we're especially loving neons and pastels), but things like glitter, nail stickers, and additional patterns and angles make for equally chic updates.</p><p>To celebrate, we asked celebrity manicurist <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=b7EhJPYVRnsxgH_MtekiIYPvg-5dCl9kCw3M3pyeSnoo03TD34b8uvkdnZnkATJVcPpl9A\" target=\"_blank\">Tom Bachik</a> (who works with A-list clients like Jennifer Lopez and Selena Gomez) to walk us through his step-by-step process for perfecting a French nail design at home. And then, (just to get your creative juices flowing), we've included tons of French manicure inspiration pics for you to scroll through at the end. Try them yourself or simply screenshot for whenever we're allowed to visit the nail salon again. Keep Scrolling! </p><p>When it comes to perfecting the art of an at-home French manicure or nail design, Bachik says that above all, a slow and steady approach wins the race. </p><p>\"I find the biggest mistake people make when attempting a French manicure at home is rushing the process,\" he warns. \"Because a French manicure has multiple layers and the white goes on thicker, it can be easy to smudge. Be patient, and take your time. Allow each step to dry before moving to the next step.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037701569-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>First things first, you'll need to thoroughly remove any old polish using a polish remover—Bachik says acetone-based formulas are most effective. Then, do like Bachik and make sure you have all the right tools on hand. \"I use Tweezerman tools on all of my clients because they’re high quality and still affordable,\" he tells us. For the best nail prep, follow Bachik's below protocol: Using the Tweezerman Cuticle Pusher & Nail Cleaner ($15), gently push back cuticles to even out the shape of your nails, and lift excess cuticle from the nail. Remove excess cuticle and any extra bits like hangnails with the Stainless Steel Cuticle Nipper ($22).  Next, create the general shape of your nails, and reduce the length if desired. \"The cuticle nipper tool does this perfectly,\" Bachik notes. \"Keeping your nails slightly longer will make polishing the tips easier and less messy.\" Last, perfect your nail shape using a smooth-grit nail file. As far as your technique, Bachik recommends holding your hands away from you using the horizon as a guide to get an even and consistent shape across all of your nails. Before you begin with your polish, make sure to remove any leftover filing dust or surface oils with Isopropyl alcohol.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037705880-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Start by applying a base coat to your nails and let it dry completely,\" instructs Bachik.  Pro tip: If you have shorter nail beds, Bachik says you can actually camouflage the tips by using an opaque natural nude color first, before applying your white tip. This essentially allows you to \"fake\" where your nail beds actually start and will create the illusion of longer nails. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037711625-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Then, using a white polish, apply the white along the tip of your nails. \"Be careful not to make the white tip too thick or it will create the illusion of shorter nails,\" Bachik explains. \"If the white tip is too thin it will show the natural tip too soon and look grown out.\" As far as how you apply your white tip, Bachik says you have a few different options. Ultimately, he suggests trying out a few techniques to see what feels most comfortable and natural.  \"As an artist, I like to draw an imaginary line down the center of the nail and what I do to one side I do to the other,\" explains Bachik. \"This technique helps me to be more consistent by only having to focus on one side then matching with the other versus trying to make the whole thing perfect all at once.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037716764-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Option #1: Wipe most of the white off the tip of the brush. Place your finger on a flat surface to keep it stable. Turn your finger to one side so the side of your nail is facing up. Apply the brush to that side of the tip of your nail and brush the white from the corner of the nail just past the center. Then, turn your finger to the other side, and polish from that corner just past the center overlapping the first stroke to create your ’smile line'. Repeat on the other fingers. Option #2: Wipe most of the white off the tip of the brush. Instead of going horizontally, from side to side, use the brush vertically (same direction as finger and nail) use just the tip of the brush starting in the center, working out toward the sides, to create your ’smile line’ Repeat on the other fingers. Option #3: Use clear Scotch tape to mask-off the tip of your nail leaving it free to apply your white polish. Simply wipe most of the white off the tip of the brush, apply your white polish, and remove the tape. Repeat on the other fingers. Option #4: Purchase French manicure sticker guides, and apply them to the nail like the Scotch tape method, masking-off the nail and leaving the tip free to apply your white polish. \"The nice thing about the guides is they are pre-shaped into a nice curve for a perfect French shape,\" Bachik notes. Repeat on the other fingers. Clean-up: Regardless of the technique you decide to use, finish your white tip by using one end of the Tweezerman Cuticle Pusher & Nail Cleaner tightly wrapped in cotton and dipped in nail polish remover to go back and clean up around your tip even deepen the smile line for a perfected French shape. Bachik says an old gel eye or lip liner brush saturated with remover will also work in a pinch. Pro tip: \"The white tip on French manicures is usually a bit thicker than a normal coat of polish, so be patient and wait for it to dry completely before you go to the next step,\" Bachik tells us. \"If you' don't wait long enough, you'll risk smudging or smearing the white you just spent so much time perfecting!\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037729643-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Next, it's time to apply your preferred color of sheer pink or nude over the top to tint your nail and smoothly soften the starkness of your white tip. Pro tip: \"Use the same clean-up tool you used before (either your cuticle pusher that's wrapped in cotton or your eye or lip liner brush) dipped in remover to go back and clean up any polish from around the cuticle area,\" says Bachik. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037735065-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Last but not least, finish off your French manicure with your favorite top coat to protect and add high-gloss shine.</figcaption></figure></p><p>\"This is where you get to have fun with it!\" exclaims Bachik. \"You can still use the general techniques from above but change it up a bit with the shapes.\"</p><p>For instance, instead of a classic, soft, natural 'smile line’ on your tip, Bachik says you can switch it up to create a deeper oval (for a more dramatic look) or you can create sharp sides to create a modern-looking V-shaped French nail design.</p><p>\"Also, don’t forget to play with color!\" he notes. \"Make each tip a different color, or each side of the tip a different color. Add accents like a metallic stripe between the tip or a stud in the cuticle or between a two-colored tip...the options are endless! The key is to play and have fun with it and make it your own.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037859060-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A classic white French manicure is eternally chic. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037753862-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Double your arch, double your fun. To take things further, try a few (or an entire row or two) of light-catching rhinestones.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037840946-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>How chic do tortoiseshell tips look as an upgraded French nail design?</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037766883-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>If all-over chrome or metallic nails feel like too much, using a shimmery silver shade instead of traditional white is a great way to give your French manicure a fresh new feel for fall. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037829703-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Two pastel hues look elegant and sophisticated. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037775516-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>For a more whimsical nod to the French nail trend, why not make your tips (literally) drip with gold?</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037784641-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>The iconic French manicure, but make it black. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037803035-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A few star stickers take this traditional white French nail design to the next level. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037881951-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Your basic French manicure taken to the tenth floor—we're adding this wave-inspired look to our DIY bucket list.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037976415-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Make your classic French nail design two-handed—we dare you to choose two ultra-bold polish colors for ultimate contrast. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037987189-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Red French tips look chic and unexpected paired with additional nail art—like this navy flower. (Not an artist? Try a nail art sticker, instead!)</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037993273-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Another option? Neon green with a smiley face or two. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598038000544-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>We love the bold look of long length paired with electric shades like hot pink. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598037955121-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This French nail design might be a bit more complex to tackle, but how cool will your tips look when they're rimmed with pastel flames?</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598038008484-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Nothing fits better with a French nail design than a rainbow. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598038015994-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A class white French nail design topped with a sweet sprinkling of cherries. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598038020779-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>If you're a glitter fiend like us, we highly recommend a taking your next French manicure to sparkling, star-studded heights. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288722/french-nail-designs-288722-1598038036047-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Work your angles! Try an array of punchy colors instead of white, and angle your Frenchie to the outer, upper corners of your tips instead of straight across the top. Basically, you're going for upside-down hearts. Up next, 7 Fall Nail Colors We're Already Obsessing Over Because Time Isn't Real</figcaption></figure></p><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/aRqIrXhS2P8\" height=\"1\" 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"These Under-$20 Granny Chains Instantly Upgrade Any Quarantine 'Fit","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/AFfU-YRRo9A/granny-chain-mask-hack","description":"<p>Chalk one up for nonna! Yes, it's true: Elder matriarchs around the world have inspired the latest in quarantine fashion with the granny-chain mask hack.</p><p>But we'd be remiss not to tip our hat to wardrobe expert <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=WM-qzQoYpTglahkuUjULtGKn-COC-XBnX-7YwgA5KEu_LsTOXtvK2YUY8SM1Y9J3M5SuGP3BbVKP2qLQ\" target=\"_blank\">Allison Freer</a>, who came up with this clever solution for having your mask on hand at all times. Freer told <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=T6r-Lk16o5tfwdJFgCpD7UgW0HXRti74bCUnyPLw5gcACV8WzALtl54UG6RDJ2eoAfrKSMbmNkZGHNMYwLKwEquGVJ6UQXxDaxiMrMHHyQ4_NhGdVFx7IR_D\" target=\"_blank\">The Strategist</a> that after seeing the classic retro granny chain repurposed in an Instagram post by jewelry brand <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=O3yGNinOZuAKucOxQk43ex8F1isuVIBbJHRh4iFlhvIq3Sh3gCbOaU-A3hA\">Éliou</a>, she had to have one. \"It's turned out to be the single best purchase I've made in months.\" We spotted a similar post by our friends at <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=v1IT2M5CBUYgdQJWtmTF0DR_RLeFAl7nVAHHn1gZeFPw0-7_C-D3T5o7CFnYSXQA\" target=\"_blank\">Donni</a> and began to take note. </p><p>So admittedly, while <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/retro-fashion-trends\" target=\"_blank\">grandma herself didn't exactly start this new trend</a>, she's certainly perfected the style over the years with an assortment of decorative eyeglasses chains.</p><p>Taking inspiration from the previously mentioned sources, we thought we'd put this hack to the test. No matter what type of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/face-masks\" target=\"_blank\">mask you're wearing</a>, it's possible to find a chain that not only compliments your style but also is effective at keeping your mask easily accessible. Freer notes, \"It's a nice alternative to storing your mask under your chin, which many people seem to be doing; I can't say for sure that wearing it on a chain keeps it cleaner, but it <em>does</em> keep the elastic from getting stretched out.\" </p><p>Ready to add a granny chain to your rotation of quarantine ensembles? Keep scrolling for our favorite finds under $20—and don't forget to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/celebs-washing-hands\" target=\"_blank\">wash your hands</a>! </p><p><figure><img 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"A Designer Told Me Which Basics Everyone Will Wear With Jeans This Fall","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/uf9AkGGZQKE/best-fall-basics-for-jeans","description":"<p>We're just a few days away from September, which means one thing (well, it means a lot of things, but in this context): It's time to start dusting off the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/jeans-and-sneaker-outfits\" target=\"_blank\">jeans</a>. Aside from it just being far too hot, in this age of quarantine, it's safe to assume that you haven't been wearing jeans as much as usual. I don't know if it's just me, but I'm actually ready to start wearing jeans again. (Call me crazy, but weather permitting, I even wear them to work at home sometimes.)</p><p>With a reignited seasonal interest in jeans comes, you guessed it—a need for some new basics, and I turned to an expert in that field for a little guidance on the subject. <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=yUGFo41Yugbd_SPxpNftxIl_yCNMCrSBTaAo_MyYOBcBSuEykbtBhgUt8aHXzp-pSUd8\" target=\"_blank\">Danielle Williams-Eke</a> is the Design Director of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=ecGI_pGUGsQQ3heyv6qw5J3rVcRMhW-zrnY9kMQuG4g807FOwy_CDqY80FOaoKarH0l0xdTEqCRpYrnYV_KzvmmGuOmU6x3kk8rjyHuqpX9NNlyFG5QSDBAYgnwR4zN4n1psIlhNVjG5MGSgVsOu4Cmh\" target=\"_blank\">11 Honoré</a>, which is the internet's best source for stylish, high-end plus-size clothing. The brand just launched an in-house namesake line of its own (designed by Williams-Eke herself), which is filled with beautiful, elevated, timeless basics. Keep scrolling to find out which easy everyday basics she told me will be common pairings with denim this fall, and shop perfect jeans to go along with them.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034568873-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034572240-image.1200x965uc.gif\"><figcaption>\"Gray suiting was all over the runway for fall and is such an easy layering piece that instantly gives your jeans an elevated look! Pair your blazer and jeans with your favorite tee or a chic turtleneck.\"—Danielle Williams-Eke</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034629057-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034611584-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034618928-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288749/best-fall-basics-for-jeans-288749-1598034570545-image.1200x965uc.gif\"><figcaption>\"A staple in many women’s wardrobe, a bodysuit is a perfect piece to wear with your jeans. errs on the simpler side, at some point or another you’ve probably wondered whether you’re accidentally venturing too close to the world of dressing <em>boring</em>. I get it. In fact, I’m sure that to some my outfits do appear less-than-interesting at times, but one thing I’ve found that always helps make <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fall-basics\" target=\"_blank\">my arsenal of basics and neutrals</a> feel a little more exciting is the addition of cool bags and shoes.</p><p>Enter: the latest pieces from our Who What Wear line of accessories, all of which are not only eye-catching and on-trend but are also <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fall-fashion-under-50\" target=\"_blank\">on the relatively more affordable side</a>, too. In short, whether you opt for one piece or can't help but snag a few, they're all you need to turn your go-to look from simple to, well, simple-but-cool. 04-1597849627671-main.1749x1440uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn77@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-33-439_4c746385bea5a694.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597849124948-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn65@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-14-31-022_9de65368eea81f74.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597848964767-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx7/cdn26@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-14-12-814_87d8000013478812.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597849444937-main.1920x1440uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn97@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-14-22-695_f2bea0c4dfa95e0c.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597849216440-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn42@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-07-277_6f27bc1261cc34a0.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597849213241-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn57@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-16-282_719a0137effcdfc9.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288704/affordable-accessories-summer-fall-288704-1597849789388-main.1920x1440uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn61@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-28-066_c8b571ac9183a492.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/YFLzHAY2eAs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx19/cdn69@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-13-09-382_c3a4b94e94e3be76.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581861},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"25 Age-Erasing Products Celebs and Editors Both Love","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/hU-0QQlSsMA/anti-aging-skincare-products","description":"<p>We all know <em>that</em> person. You know, the one who looks like they're 20, but they're actually 40 or 50. The person who looks youthfully preserved in time and doesn't really seem to have changed in the years that you've known them. They probably get carded all the time. And all you want to ask them is for their exact beauty-and-skincare routine—and also maybe what kind of witchcraft and sorcery they've been doing to have such perfect skin.</p><p>Listen, I know getting older is just a part of life. There's no stopping it, but there's also no shame in aging, either. I always like to think of it as getting wiser and more comfortable with myself each year. But I also don't think there's anything wrong with wanting to protect your skin from some of the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-foundation-for-mature-skin/\" target=\"_blank\">signs of aging</a>: loss of elasticity, more sensitivity, fine lines, wrinkles, dryness, etc. You don't really need to look far for products that will help in that department. There's no shortage of lotions, serums, eye creams, and oils to preserve your skin. But the downside is a lot of them are expensive, and some might flat-out not work. </p><p>So if you're looking for the products that those seemingly ageless people use (and that are actually effective), I did the research for you and rounded up the skincare buys of both editors and celebs alike. See my homework below.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597889911731-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597889646405-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Victoria Beckham's facialist, Melanie Grant, shared a breakdown of the fashion designer's skincare routine, which included cult-favorite Augustinus Bader The Cream. The product hydrates and promotes skin renewal thanks to ingredients like aloe vera; antioxidants; amino acids; vitamins A, B, C, and E; and retinol.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597890177880-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597890262198-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Senior editor Allyson Payer still gets carded even though she's 35, so you know she's doing something right with her skin. She uses Kate Somerville's face cleanser daily. \"I know the price seems high for a face wash, but I've been using this for years, and it's worth it. It's mildly exfoliating and never leaves my dry skin feeling tight,\" she said.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897220916-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Payer picked this cleanser as one she wished she started using in her 20s. \"Given that you literally wash face cleanser down the drain, I never really cared to invest in quality ones that were well-suited for my sensitive skin,\" she said. \"I'm sure my skin would've been better off had I done a little more research and acknowledged that anything that touches your skin is affecting it, regardless of whether or not you're rinsing it off immediately.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897262671-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"This is one of the first skincare products I invested in years ago, and I still use it to this day. It's the perfect exfoliant, in my opinion. It really gets the job done without being harsh and drying,\" Payer says.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597890719472-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597890600969-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Halle Berry's longtime facialist, Olga Lorencin, has her own skincare line, so you can get her signature facials at home. Berry has posted a photo of her using one of the kits at home. The Ageless Facial box contains a no-rinse peel and a no-rinse sleep mask, targeting dryness, flaky skin, uneven tone, wrinkles, and pores.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597891286118-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597890889892-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Jennifer Lopez told People she swears by glycolic acid to give her a healthy glow and clear skin. She's been known to visit Beverly Hills dermatologist Harold Lancer, who has his own famous skincare line. We're willing to bet she's got this glycolic acid cream in her beauty stash. It exfoliates, reduces the appearance of lines and discoloration, and leaves skin extra glowy.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597891464030-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597891640070-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Sofía Vergara used Charlotte Tilbury's mask to prep her skin before the Oscars, so you know it's good for any occasion, even if it's not a Hollywood award show. The clay mask transforms your skin in 10 minutes, leaving it hydrated, smooth, and cleansed.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597891772172-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597891832830-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I use this eye cream every night to moisturize, de-puff, firm, and lighten my dark circles. After a few uses, my eyes looked a lot brighter, which comes in handy when I'm running on little sleep.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597892074630-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This is another product in my nighttime routine. I love that it has both retinol to improve skin texture and firmness, and vitamin C to brighten. The best part is that it doesn't leave my sensitive skin dry or irritated.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597892384498-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Sunscreen should be an essential part of your anti-aging skincare routine and any routine, in general. Supergoop!'s Glow Screen goes on so smoothly and leaves a nice illuminating finish. I love that it makes my skin look so healthy. Sometimes when I'm feeling lazy and don't want to put on a full face of makeup, I put this product, some concealer, and mascara on and call it a day.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894191164-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597893023482-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Thandie Newton shared on her now-defunct website that she loves all Clarins products, especially its eye creams and lip balms. This particular eye treatment is meant for morning and night use. It works to smooth wrinkles and reduce puffiness and dark circles.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894489448-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894408453-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Like The Cream, Augustinus Bader's Rich version is hydrating and rejuvenating, but it also offers extra protection against dry climates. It's formulated for nighttime use, but you can also apply it in the morning. Kate Bosworth is a big fan, saying, \"I'm obsessed with this face cream. It's incredibly results-driven—I'm a huge skincare fanatic, and this is a product that I’ve absolutely been loving. It’s great for the winter season or when you're traveling a lot and feel super dry.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894548563-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894773537-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>January Jones regularly posts about her skincare-and-beauty routine, so we're lucky to get some inside intel on what she does to get her skin looking so amazing. One product she uses is Sisley Paris's Black Rose Cream mask, which she shared as one of her favorites on rotation for exfoliation and moisture. \"These change all the time depending on what my skin is needing, (factoring in weather, travel and stress),\" the actress explained of her mask picks.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894878267-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Tata Harper's resurfacing mask is another Jones favorite. It contains BHA and enzymes to target dull skin and remove debris and dead skin cells.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597894908083-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Jones said she only washes her face at night and just splashes water or sprays rose water in the morning. Omorovicza's gentle exfoliator is part of her nighttime routine. It's both a mechanical and chemical exfoliant.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895159105-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Jones says she reserves her face oils and balms for before bedtime, after applying active serum or retinol. She counts Sisley Paris's face oil as one of her favorites. Ingredients like black rose extract and omegas-3 and -6 help to nourish and soothe skin. You can even use it before you prep your skin for other products, too.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895666166-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895475175-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Who What Wear Editor in Chief Kat Collings tried her colleague and friend Shayna Kossove's skincare routine because she's got the best youthful skin in pretty much the whole office. Kossove uses Tata Harper's exfoliating cleanser in the mornings, so Collings followed suit. \"The brand recommends massaging it onto a dry face first, which takes a little getting used to, but I love that this cleanser is doing more than just cleaning my face. The gentle exfoliation helps prep the skin so it's prepared to absorb the ultra-important next step, vitamin C serum,\" she said.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895602341-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Kossove's moisturizer of choice is Charlotte Tilbury's Magic Cream, so Collings applied it every day, too. \"I've used this cream on and off over the years and always pull it out when I need a secret weapon against dry, flaking skin,\" Collings said. \"In the winter, when my nose has about had it with frigid air and too much tissue use, this is the only thing that will save it. It's definitely on the heavier side, but given one of Shayna's star skincare ingredients is retinoid, which can be very drying, this cream helps keep the skin balanced.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897459072-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895879014-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Jennifer Aniston loves a good skincare gadget, including Ziip's device, saying she had \"never seen such a result from a little machine like that.\" The tool uses nanocurrent and microcurrent technology to promote collagen and elastin production, increase circulation, and repair tissue.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897558240-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597895946899-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Drew Barrymore is a beauty enthusiast, and she's even got her own brand, Flower Beauty. So we trust her skincare knowledge. She shared her favorite eye creams on Instagram, and Caudalie's Premier Cru made the cut. The best-selling cream contains peptides and three signature ingredients: resveratrol, Viniferine, and grape-seed polyphenols to lift, firm, brighten, and protect.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597896323344-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Estée Lauder's eye serum was also featured on Barrymore's post of favorite creams, of which she said, \"These work! I've tried everything and will continue to find the holy grail for dark circles.\" The product keeps your eyes moisturized for 24 hours thanks to hyaluronic acid.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597896318761-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Barrymore uses Sunday Riley's Juno oil along with Now Solutions' Vitamin E to keep her skin hydrated. The face oil is packed with good-for-the-skin ingredients like superfood seed oils; antioxidants; amino acids; omegas-3, -6, and -9; and vitamins A and C.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897631147-main.900x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597896788918-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Beauty editor Erin Jahns's mom has the most amazing skin, and she's in her 70s! Needless to say, we listen to every word she says when she talks skincare. \"This essence-serum hybrid is definitely an investment,\" she said of La Prairie's Skin Caviar Essence-In Lotion. \"However, it really helps hydrate and condition the skin, and I've also seen improvements in the firmness and how plump and youthful my skin looks since I added it to my normal routine. Essentially, it's a treatment you apply after you cleanse and tone, and it acts kind of like a serum-primer—enhancing the benefits of whatever serum you use afterward—while also utilizing nutrient-rich caviar water to make your pores looks smooth and tiny.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897808837-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288693/anti-aging-skincare-products-288693-1597897025683-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>You might have seen this Dr. Dennis Gross mask on Instagram and thought, \"What IS that?!\" Well, it may look a little crazy, but it really works. Jessica Alba, other celebrities, and my fellow editors think it's worth the splurge and love the device. It's powered by LED red-light and blue-light technology to target wrinkles, firm skin, and clear acne. 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"Ashley Madekwe Is a Londoner Living in L.A.—Here Are Her Top 3 Fall Shoe Trends","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/Eeg33ANw99M/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration","description":"<p>Just this morning, our Who What Wear editors went through an exercise where we shared the five main ways we each identify ourselves, and responses included dog mom, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/what-to-wear-in-new-orleans\" target=\"_blank\">Southerner</a>, and Italian American. Well, if Ashley Madekwe had been on our Zoom call, I have a feeling she'd mention the three identifiers that she features prominently <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=Pr2R5GBkTC9BNpHi9htmJVxZxW4P6qA7l-I6h1lL4D6k9LgJIezocr1x2IXHOOqzJt-F6xBefw\" target=\"_blank\">in her Instagram bio</a> for all to see: actress, South <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/london-summer-fashion-trends-chloe-pierre\" target=\"_blank\">London girl</a> living in L.A., and founder of Ring My Bell, her website.</p><p>I recently interviewed Madekwe to get the scoop on her new collaboration with <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=Gn4Wh6ajnBemHhfuIUDB8GAODefibLfcl_RT2sddTkujgpkE_7Q_eA\" target=\"_blank\">JustFab</a>, so naturally I had to throw in a question about her view on the style differences on each side of the pond. \"I think the main difference is attitude,\" she told Who What Wear. \"London has an edge—it’s fast paced and most people navigate the city by walking or on public transport. That adds a layer of utilitarianism to the style there. In LA I think the attitude is more relaxed and of course the weather informs how people dress.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962005226-image.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>As part of the collaboration, Madekwe curated an online shop on JustFab's website called Walk With Purpose, which features her personal favorite shoe trends. \"To me, walking with purpose means being confident, being unafraid to stand up for what you believe in and having the courage to ask for what you deserve,\" Madekwe told me about the collection. \"Together we also created the Yes Girl, Yes T-shirt as a way to offer women a message of positivity and encouragement.  We hear no too often. I think it’s time we heard and felt yes. It’s been amazing to be able to utilize fashion as an avenue to inspire and empower women.\" The collab also extended beyond just shoes. \"An added bonus was that as part of the collaboration, I was able to donate with JustFab to a female driven charity of my choice,\" Madekwe said. \"I chose Beauty 2 the Streetz. It’s run by the incredible Shirley Raines. I’ve been following her and the work she does with the homeless women of LA for a while now. It started 3 years ago with providing beauty treatments, showers, haircuts, etc but has quickly developed to provide homeless women with food, shelter and other necessities.\"  Scroll down to see Madekwe's top 3 favorite fall shoe trends and shop the ones she's wearing. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597961534895-image.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>\"I love boots and booties (in general not just for the fall) which is why there are so many in my collection! I like the versatility of them and I’ll often reach for a boot over a high heeled pump. We used mostly block and cuban heels because they’re so wearable.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962466414-product.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962693098-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962684041-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597961535509-image.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>\"The cowboy boot comeback seems like it’s here to stay for a while. The Mae boot from my collection really encapsulates that trend well. I love the zipper feature at the back of the boot because I hate struggling to pull my boots off.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962633920-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597963033055-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962979721-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597961532714-image.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>\"I like the slip on loafer trend because it takes the timeless shape of a loafer and adds a twist by making it a slip on mule. The ‘Smooth Transition’ loafer is a really chic way to add color and elevate a casual look.\"  </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288735/ashley-madekwe-justfab-collaboration-288735-1597962582607-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"6 New Bikini Trends I Can Only Really Describe as Shocking","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/DfXA7dHaHv8/barely-there-bikini-trends","description":"<p>At this point in the season, we've pretty much been sticking to a uniform that involves bikinis, denim shorts, sandals, and little else. Typically, there's only one objective during these summer weekends, and that's to get as much sun as possible, wearing one of the barely there bikinis that are designed to maximize sun exposure and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-tanning-bikinis\" target=\"_blank\">minimize tan lines</a>. But if you thought settling for a plain triangle bikini was good enough, you thought wrong. Instead, we've noticed a new crop of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/celebs-wearing-string-bikini-bottoms\" target=\"_blank\">barely there bikini trends</a> on the rise—and these styles are so minimal they're shocking.</p><p>Like most controversial swimsuit trends, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/celebrity-bikini-trends-2020\" target=\"_blank\">celebrities</a> and fashion girls are leading the pack here. We've spotted them in bikinis that are redefining what \"barely there\" even means and some that are straight-up optical illusions. I might be slightly shook at the thought of donning any of these styles, but I can't deny how fire following 'grams are. To see these six new daring bikini trends and how they're worn, simply keep scrolling.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437167993-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Exactly as the name suggests, \"floss\" bikinis feature super-thin straps for a barely-there look that's also great if you're trying to minimize your tan lines, but be warned: These are definitely on the minimal side when it comes to coverage.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592492192961-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1596035206321-main.1001x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592491793181-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437171764-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Next up, we have the loincloth bikini trend. Featuring ruched or scrunched-up material, this skin-baring trend seems to be really taking off this summer. Color me a little shocked to see dozens of trendsetters sporting the look and even more surprised at myself for wanting to try it.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493012276-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592491921591-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592492763090-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437173305-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Pretty sure this one speaks for itself, but I'll spell it out in case anything's not clear. (See what I did there?) Transparent and see-through straps are the ultimate trompe l'oeil, giving off the illusion that nothing is there.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592491997447-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1563572172755-product.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437174842-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>With a healthy dose of nostalgia, we're seeing the return of ultra-high-cut swimsuits that give a nod to retro style. Cool as they may be, I'd be lying if I said that I'm used to baring that much skin above my hips. Maybe it's just me, though!</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493251423-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493441350-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493268980-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437169916-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Another inventive way to wear the barely there swim trend right now is via cutout bandeau tops. Whether cut out in the middle or underneath to highlight a little underboob action, this trend is quickly gaining steam.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592494188623-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493647932-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493746854-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437166016-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Thong bikinis have been on the rise since last summer, and now they're a full-blown trend. As in, they're no longer only popular with a select group of fashion girls—they're everywhere. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437836671-main.960x1450uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img 447-main.960x1450uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn99@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-14-00-385_c3bf9a046c60a3f4.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1563572172755-product.1200x1365uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn16@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-13-58-783_eaccc3e380dbaf6a.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437174842-image.850x1275uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn33@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-14-14-397_0a927f4e66e283ac.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493251423-main.2000x3001uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn33@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-22-578_5ef281c254723d9b.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493441350-main.1200x1200uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn73@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-28-529_c7d13aa818611c8c.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493268980-main.2000x3001uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx32/cdn80@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-53-069_ce74a3e59f6d15f5.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437169916-image.850x1275uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn65@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-19-011_258a2218bd5a7c52.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592494188623-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn26@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-13-485_bcae58fbfad88a6a.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493647932-main.960x1450uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn74@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-36-515_9d25b66feba846b2.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592493746854-main.1200x1200uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn21@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-13-17-306_3dea1f4e9749cde6.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437166016-image.850x1275uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn51@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-51-834_ccc5ee4a8a2f065f.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592437836671-main.960x1450uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn97@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-30-082_62d709351403013c.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/281390/barely-there-bikini-trends-281390-1592494319035-main.960x1450uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn27@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-25-400_c19b9c648f1f6333.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/DfXA7dHaHv8":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn70@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-29-172_66e25bb9228cf178.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581865},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"Kamala Harris Has Been Wearing Her Signature Accessory for 35 Years","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/42Cg_Q-GGUM/kamala-harris-style","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288608/kamala-harris-style-288608-1597264466517-main.2516x1887uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>It was the news heard 'round the world: Senator Kamala Harris made history yesterday as the first Black woman and the first South Asian woman to be selected as a vice-presidential candidate for a major party. Although she's already served as the San Francisco district attorney, the California attorney general, and a California senator, securing the national ticket now thrusts her into the brightest spotlight of her 30-year career.</p><p>And yes, that means more people will be paying attention to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/michelle-obama-post-white-house-style\" target=\"_blank\">what she's wearing</a>. As every avid fashion lover knows, you can be interested in a woman's style <em>and</em> her substance, not just one or the other. And with this mindset, I wanted to point out the one piece of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fall-jewelry-trends-2020\" target=\"_blank\">jewelry</a> that Harris has incorporated into nearly every outfit for public appearances for decades: pearl necklaces. Our first photographic evidence? Her 1986 college graduation photo. </p><p>Harris has clearly made a deliberate choice to use pearls to craft a signature style—a <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fashion-uniforms\" target=\"_blank\">uniform</a> if you will. Not only does having a uniform make it easier to get dressed in the morning, but I believe it can also convey a sense of reliability and even loyalty. It's also worth pointing out that the pearls could be an homage to Harris's college sorority Alpha Kappa Alpha—the first African American Greek-letter sorority—where the founders are referred to as the Twenty Pearls. Any way you look at it, there's no doubt she intends to bring her pearls of wisdom to the White House, both literally and figuratively. Scroll down to see how she's worn them over 25 years. </p><p><figure><img 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"I Got a Nordstrom Stylist to Make 5 Outfits for Me (and Every Piece Is on Sale)","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/zgWaZS26X68/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits","description":"<p>While my job may involve <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fall-shopping-online\" target=\"_blank\">telling <em>other </em>people what to buy</a> and wear all day, there’s no denying that, even as an editor, at times I’m at a loss for an outfit idea myself. Hey, it happens to the best of us, and when it does there’s no shame in reaching out for a little help. In fact, I hear it’s encouraged. So, when recently I became aware that everyone’s favorite store and shopping site, Nordstrom (duh), provides free styling services for anyone in the form of<a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=K90s2ImAhg6mvio2WikTckXwsmdZ1DiUmVhFnYsSL5m2RxYOtilv_03Zai4QvnnLcwWKCHbUtPClFxRx4sSa0yYne9uGAce_gJxyXYHRkCWzJLgdrOoWdJgA7_83IzmFS-pPHyIRk8VLEN9o87TYwJiusGoC6tGwylNQRzy9jsUFi-CfJMOSScW106s8auYv5JL21VF0VsakK5M\" target=\"_blank\"> virtual appointments</a>, chats, and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=6vDjgWjlNTTO7cjA-d4DvRFjpJkm4sxWX5M4HdYD9zVRo-vQbS5YMxmea6-cVslfZ0vaklTYxnN7C5rw_JqRrVV9_4FRpgfsX6YU-lyh8xUNQgCAo3eYYzHcpkAHSht85f2QHVqCYyNkZydPJcOAJp-12kiViHfVHFJR\" target=\"_blank\">pre-curated looks</a>, I couldn’t help but reach out and see what they could do for me.</p><p>After getting paired with stylist Ebony Campbell, I provided a little mood board that illustrated some of my go-to looks and overall vibe. I then asked if she could curate five different outfits for me to wear when I’m no longer expecting come fall—<a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/summer-to-fall-shopping\" target=\"_blank\">something I'm pretty excited about</a>! Oh, and since they happen to be in the midst of their famous <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=D10S-qJt6X4loy-Et3GqcJCULvJqekJJIwkAqHGF1Usk-xhyVvZfPS-6lj1HaXcJV8CwgfQ45-S8qjlvXMIO9NGD3cmp-VFxy3K_XSBgaB5DAEYBwMcSrppJbUiCcZzaXsCzyO8zhE5yLkq9dzltZjl0j1sCgliq_uBOikMtocVlWLIwM_nR8dLR8ogpsm3yw3e07QEb7Ci_AkEyGGVuaTYp_cyJ88auTfbOMPzJYAb8Uiut8QGEY4neUUMt6_68i1l0Ss8hDSbeHoKFpVJlF-nCgQHHkTM6Txp3XFdhsuA\" target=\"_blank\">Anniversary Sale</a> at the moment, I (rather shamelessly) asked if Campbell could stick to the marked-down section of the site, too. She was kind enough to oblige, and if now you're thinking <em>it doesn't get better than that</em>, I must say I agree with you. One final upside, however, is that while these outfits were, in fact, tailored to my style, I think you'll agree upon seeing them that they are universally cool and might just want to shop them for yourself—so really, we're all winners here. To get started, just keep scrolling. </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1598010944315-main.1500x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597788419804-image.1200x1708uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>\"Even when wearing sweats, Nicole is dressing in a really intentional, chic way. So, for this laid back look, I went with an updated, elevated style and kept it tonal, down to the silver details.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597857441362-main.2640x3724uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597789277731-main.2640x3136uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597857312579-main.2640x4048uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597857365534-main.1660x1783uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288699/nordstrom-sale-stylist-outfits-288699-1597857586847-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>\"I love how Nicole will wear all black and then pop her look with a single statement print or texture. src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1579313583387-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-engagement-rings-by-price\" target=\"_blank\">Engagement ring shopping</a> can be overwhelming, especially when you're not quite sure which style you want. There are so many different cuts to choose from, from princess to Asscher to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/oval-engagement-rings\" target=\"_blank\">oval</a> to pear; a handful of metals to pick, including rose gold, gold, and silver; and, of course, the all-important step of finalizing the overall style. Do you want a timeless sparkler that's dainty? Would you prefer one that's a bit more vintage-inspired? Or do you want to forgo tradition altogether and opt for a <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/sapphire-engagement-rings\" target=\"_blank\">blue sapphire à la Kate Middleton</a>?</p><p>Luckily there's one way to make your quest a bit more manageable, and that's honing in on a few of the best engagement ring brands out there. By keeping your focus on a select few, you have fewer baubles to look through and can more quickly find one that speaks to you. Ahead, we've highlighted 15 brands with the best sparklers on the market. Brides-to-be, you'll find in all in our selection, from vintage-inspired ones to wallet-friendly styles. See them below, plus shop our favorite picks from each.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561080357188-main.850x850uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Brilliant Earth offers a vast selection of engagement rings and offers transparency into how they source diamonds. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561080490449-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A leader in the diamond industry, Shane Co.'s rings have been a favorite among brides for over 40 years.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561130618323-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Prices reflect setting only.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561080684888-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>For rings that are out-of-this-world beautiful (and oh-so-unique), look no further than fine jewelry brand Sofia Zakia. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561130921653-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561089091898-main.800x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Per the brand, each one of Jennie Kwon's pieces has been \"meticulously designed to be graceful, balanced, and wearable, with unforgettably unique accents.\" </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280741/best-engagement-ring-brands-280741-1561089196418-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Lafonn makes pretty jewels accessible to everyone. item of 2020. Who could have? But since we're all <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/weekend-plans-stylist\" target=\"_blank\">spending more time at home</a>, it's safe to say this has become our go-to piece of clothing—and it looks like many celebs agree. </p><p>Whether embracing that 24/7 cozy lifestyle in traditional terry cloth, prioritizing <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/exfoliating-foot-masks\" target=\"_blank\">DIY spa treatments</a> while wrapped in a lightweight layer, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-swim-tops\" target=\"_blank\">lounging poolside</a> in a pretty cover-up or even throwing on a bright, patterned kimono before taking a Zoom call (we're looking at you, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=S6zdsKtJ4ZDWoTwKq2GUgiDV_tiBE2C8SYPffWnjzRVrciiDfLNfeNGvd0FYwMFbegw8eMbbo-Q\" target=\"_blank\">Hillary Kerr</a>!), robes of all stripes have rightfully earned their place in our 2020 wardrobes. </p><p>After noticing this trend on Instagram, our inklings were affirmed when <em>The New York Times</em> reported that <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=ACX1XUqgXVRGt5umsraLfc1SqHbLaMpyCUXYclrpGs3213Y7nph28yFk4PVUAz8LGJREka8oiiVC2limxmwvzlOtCVkZJCPGaJCxfnAUO9mXs-5Kgb5vNUtf-Z6ddpyqLewHHcvf\" target=\"_blank\">robe sales had more than doubled</a> in the past few months. The best part? There are so many styles to choose from. Whether you're all about the bathrobe like <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/victoria-beckham-least-favorite-trends\" target=\"_blank\">Victoria Beckham</a>, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/chrissy-teigen-capsule-wardrobe\" target=\"_blank\">Chrissy Teigen</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/work-from-home-outfit-idea-emily-ratajkowski\" target=\"_blank\">Emily Ratajakowski</a>, or favor flowier styles like January Jones, Nicole Richie, and Cardi B, there's the perfect robe 'fit to be found. </p><p>So what are you waiting for? Start scrolling—it's time to get wrapped up!</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287489/celebs-in-robes-287489-1590689287291-main.1080x1349uc.jpg\"><figcaption>We were pleasantly surprised to see Victoria Beckham née Posh embracing robe life this week with her son Cruz. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287489/celebs-in-robes-287489-1590689295374-main.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>How cute are Chrissy and mom, Pepper? 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"First Look: Princess Diana's Wedding Gown Steals the Show in The Crown","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/1ObDFcOCmjw/princess-diana-wedding-the-crown","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288729/princess-diana-wedding-the-crown-288729-1597946303806-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Netflix has done it again. They've released a new teaser for the upcoming season of <em>The Crown</em> and made it hard to focus on anything else. Season four will debut on November 15 featuring Olivia Colman reprising her role as Queen Elizabeth. There will also be a newcomer whose role is highly-anticipated to say the least: Emma Corrin will play <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/rugby-shirts\" target=\"_blank\">Princess Diana</a> from ages 18 to 22 in the new season, so there will certainly be a lot of memorable <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/meghan-markle-los-angeles-outfits\" target=\"_blank\">royal style moments</a>.</p><p>The new teaser trailer is brief, but offers just enough intrigue to make me mark my calendar in anticipation. The season will feature the iconic 1981 wedding of Princess Diana and Prince Charles, when Lady Diana Spencer was just 20 years old. In seasons five and six, she will be played by Elizabeth Debicki—but let's not get ahead of ourselves. Scroll down to watch the new trailer for <em>The Crown</em>. </p><p><figure><img Off","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/YR0-Ufh_7ls/backless-tops","description":"<p>Ready or not—the latest barely-there trend is officially taking its place in the fashion world and, honestly, we're here for it. Clearly, it's the year of barely-there dressing since we've seen trends like <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/g-string-bras\" target=\"_blank\">G-string bras</a> and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/lace-up-trend\" target=\"_blank\">lace-up midriffs</a> take off, and now it's time we introduce you to the next chapter of the revealing trend, what we're calling \"napkin tops\". (Yes, they're exactly what you're thinking.) They basically involve a simple piece of fabric in the front and thin straps that tie up in the back and fashion people are 100% pulling them off.</p><p>I've been following this trend for a while and now that there are enough examples and shopping options, I'm confident these are definitely a thing. The designs from indie brands like <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=JDUvNU4iynloaNNOJ_doUdxW291gdgXkooQ0jNpRwMYhqaRq6C6wbouH_BHoUrwbOIBVhtW_E2ab\" target=\"_blank\">Trois</a>, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=fSMZjNR_0rlFznWy-aOKNtZfX1qIly88jVOBkkXNKc38YC4lzoYErQPF5yyM_VPmEyEfOvg\" target=\"_blank\">Stone Label</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=BaZ19zeQ2qgyIrmQG_tTOe6Wfv3knXuCANJboPe0iliXfyPXhD_hiF941LbpBoUbm0XCCHN399w\" target=\"_blank\">Subsurface</a> were the first to flood my Instagram feed and now more and more brands are putting their spin on it, meaning there's something for every style and budget. Scroll down to see and shop the 15 best backless tops.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288505/backless-tops-288505-1596661233982-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Remember the scarf tops of the '90s? This trend is like those, but better.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288505/backless-tops-288505-1596657425725-main.1179x1768uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288505/backless-tops-288505-1596656833319-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Pictured: Trois Ruby Top ($85). "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx12/cdn85@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-21-761_b80acc7284249589.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581862},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"This Athleisure \"Trend\" Has Officially Become a Popular Basic ","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/K-4JPk55_Ao/best-activewear-sets","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288706/best-activewear-sets-288706-1597881414476-image.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>It's hard to imagine a time when matching <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/pretty-athleisure-pieces\" target=\"_blank\">athleisure </a>sets weren't all anyone was wearing, but if the course of the past couple of years has taught us anything, it's that these trending matching sets are no longer cool because they are current, they are cool because they are now a basic. It has officially become the norm to invest in sports bras, crop tops, or tanks that match your leggings or shorts so that you always at least have the <em>option</em> to step into a full outfit if you want to. Because of that exact concept, this two-piece workout (or lounge) look is honestly a saving grace. Instead of stressing over what to wear when you're trying to achieve that laidback yet put-together vibe, matching sets do all the work for you. </p><p>Ahead, you will find 25 of the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-athleisure-brands\" target=\"_blank\">best athleisure</a> sets on the market, according to me. Including some of the heavy-hitting athleisure brands like Alo, Nike, and Lululemon, I can guarantee you will walk away from this story with one or two (or three) new athleisure sets of your own. </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288706/best-activewear-sets-288706-1597865436009-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Orion Cutout Legging ($128).  Can I just wear this one as a normal outfit? With)","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/IrF_WYT-5mY/best-nordstrom-anniversary-sale-finds-2020","description":"<p><figure><img
