10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"5 Hair Accessories Fashion Girls Can't Get Enough of This Summer","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/CQfujiqa870/best-summer-hair-accessories","description":"<p>When it comes to doing my own hair, I have zero patience to do anything elaborate. Even the thought of the sheer time it takes to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/no-heat-curls-tutorial\" target=\"_blank\">curl my hair</a> (for context, my hair is rather thin, but there's a <em>lot</em> of it) is enough to make me tie it up, out of the way. This laziness on my part is largely the reason why I've since become obsessed with <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-scrunchies\" target=\"_blank\">hair accessories</a>. </p><p>With the power to make your <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/chris-appleton-beauty-products\" target=\"_blank\">hair</a> look pretty with minimal effort, hair accessories have become my go-to when my outfit feels a little plain, or I need a quick switch-up. So you can imagine my delight when, a couple of years back, hair accessories became a priority on the style agenda—a place they've remained ever since. </p><p>However, looking at my collection of hair accessories, it dawned on me that most of them were created with party season in mind. Hair clips are adorned with crystals, while velvet serves as the fabric of choice. As such, I set about to find more <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/january-jones-swimsuits\" target=\"_blank\">summer-appropriate</a> options that will still give my hair an elevated feel, without feeling <em>too</em> fancy. </p><p>From the new '90s add-on to a fresh take on puffy headbands, below you'll find an edit of the best summer hair accessories <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/denim-skirt-outfits-for-fall\" target=\"_blank\">fashion girls</a> are wearing right now.  </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288267/best-summer-hair-accessories-288267-1595236077519-image.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Style Notes: These headbands made a huge comeback a few years ago when black padded styles reigned supreme. Now, things have taken a playful turn with bright colors and different textures—just make sure yours included a knot to ensure it's 2020-appropriate. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371222227-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371313530-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371245139-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371463033-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371305264-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288267/best-summer-hair-accessories-288267-1595236077909-image.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Style Notes: Nothing has the power to give your look a fanciful feel than a hair bow. Instead of floaty ribbon, the fashion pack is opting for structured bow barrettes, which they use to effortlessly pull back the front sections of their hair. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371898889-main.1345x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371664813-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371476321-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371784186-main.1500x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595371404516-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288267/best-summer-hair-accessories-288267-1595236079360-image.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Style Notes: No longer restricted to the confines of the gym, scrunchies have become a cool girl style staple. ir-accessories-288302-1595372752001-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn98@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-13-15-263_ea4cc4174d32689f.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288302/best-summer-hair-accessories-288302-1595373359841-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx3/cdn37@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-13-26-486_9ee6182ca06c0266.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/CQfujiqa870":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn25@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-13-38-504_548364a53f861a54.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581915},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"These 5 Common Moisturizer Ingredients Are Toxic—Here's What to Buy Instead","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/27jUxAB5pMk/best-organic-moisturizers","description":"<p>Here at Who What Wear Beauty, we eat, sleep, and breathe skincare. We've tested all the most <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-anti-aging-eye-creams\" target=\"_blank\">iconic eye creams</a> and gotten our hands on the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/victoria-beckham-augustinus-bader-moisturiser\" target=\"_blank\">exclusive moisturizers</a> your favorite celeb can't stop raving about on Instagram. But when we turn to the ingredients list only to find a slew of tongue-twisting words that just <em>sound </em>bad, we can't help but give those (sometimes pricey) formulas a stern side eye. Are they really safe?</p><p>Even as editors, we sometimes find it a hassle to wade through all the misleading labels, tricky buzzwords, and ingredients we can't even pronounce to determine whether or not a product that claims to be clean or organic actually is. Especially when it comes to moisturizer, a product that so many of us use twice daily, it's difficult to stomach the idea that the ingredients in those jars could be causing toxicity in our bodies, and leading to serious health issues down the line. </p><p>To get the rundown on which ingredients to skip altogether, we tapped Tamerri Ater, product development director for <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=Ns9SL13TLmrenI5dj4c2ZwMvK4vfTQ_SY87v2STCwuKQx2HQMxhliLsfLezSFFFvRsat2yJSAor-47qYm9ZJVec6ZWox2C5LAeBnt566XWCQNbaRE2EpCXNRZval35ha\" target=\"_blank\">Versed</a> (Who What Wear's <em>actually</em> clean sister skincare brand), to get the scoop on the ingredients that belong on all of our blacklists. Read on for the five most commonly used toxic ingredients, then check out our edit of the 20 best organic moisturizers that will reveal healthy, hydrated skin.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/283927/best-organic-moisturizers-283927-1575338912613-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p dir=\"ltr\">\"This petrochemical has commonly been used in popular skincare products for decades, but you may want to avoid since there have been links to cancer and organ toxicity,\" Ater explains. And aside from the more serious ramifications, this substance is also known to be pore-clogging, which could lead to breakouts and other unwanted skin issues. </p><p dir=\"ltr\"><strong>Possible replacement:</strong> According to Ater, grapeseed oil gives a similar emollient feel to moisturizers, without any heavy or overly oily after effects.</p><p dir=\"ltr\">\"Silicones give 'slip' to skincare and haircare products and help your skin and hair feel silky and smooth, which is why they are commonly used in high-end moisturizers,\" Ater told us. \"Not all silicones are deemed bad, but it’s best to try to stay away from cyclic silicones due to their personal safety and environmental concerns.\" Some red flags you can look for on your skincare labels include cyclotetrasiloxane, cyclopentasiloxane, cyclohexasiloxane, and cyclomethicone.</p><p dir=\"ltr\"><strong>Possible Replacement:</strong> Ater says that Isohexadecane gives an equally nice velvety, emollient feel to the skin without running the risk of toxicity.</p><p dir=\"ltr\">Lots of big beauty brands have attempted to feign health consciousness by touting the fact that their formulas are paraben-free. But according to Ater, excluding these hazardous ingredients should be standard practice. \"Parabens are controversial preservatives that have been linked to breast cancer and are commonly added to cosmetic products for their antimicrobial properties,\" she told us. \"A common way to spot them on an ingredient list is to look for the suffix paraben at the end of the ingredient. Common ones are methylparaben, ethylparaben, propylparaben, and butylparaben.\"</p><p dir=\"ltr\"><strong>Possible Replacements: </strong>Per Ater's advice, phenoxyethanol and sodium benzoate with potassium sorbate are all preservatives deemed safe to use in cosmetics at indicated levels.</p><p dir=\"ltr\">\"This is one of the most controversial skin lighteners that has been banned in many countries, but not the U.S., where it is limited to a 2% concentration in over-the-counter products,\" Ater explains. \"There have been studies linking hydroquinone as the cause of hyperpigmentation (the opposite of what people use it for). High concentrations have also been found in the bloodstream after long-term use.\"</p><p dir=\"ltr\"><strong>Possible Replacement: </strong>Ater points out that a natural replacement to look out for it arbutin, which is derived from bearberry extract.</p><p dir=\"ltr\">\"Artificial colorants and dyes can be irritating to the skin and are frequently added to skincare products for their cool factor, but most of the time they're just unnecessary,\" says Ater.</p><p dir=\"ltr\"><strong>Possible Replacement:</strong> Colorants derived from plants and other natural sources are an easy alternative.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/283927/best-organic-moisturizers-283927-1574902644521-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This luxurious balm soothes even the most parched skin with blue tansy, shea butter, marula oil, and more natural goodness. It melts into a rich fluid in your hands, making it perfect to press into damp skin to lock in moisture.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/283927/best-organic-moisturizers-283927-1574902658529-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This powerful moisturizing concentrate hydrates, brightens, and smooths the skin with natural astaxanthin, supercritical chia, vitamin C ester, and a highly efficacious blend of active botanicals.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/283927/best-organic-moisturizers-283927-1574902657111-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This small-batch, handcrafted balm is made with organic, wild-harvested ingredients like beeswax, camellia oil, rosehip oil, soothing arnica, and sea buckthorn extract to provide an environmental shield on the skin that locks in moisture.  </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/283927/best-organic-moisturizers-283927-1574902653129-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This multitasking moisturizer can be used as a deep cleanser, a hydration mask, or as an overnight replenishing treatment. I discovered her on Instagram over a year ago when working on a French-girl story and I've been smitten over her style (and smile!) ever since. She exudes that insouciant, effortlessly-cool <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/french-loungewear-style\" target=\"_blank\">French-girl style</a> yet adheres to no rules—she dresses for herself and adds a dose of color, fun, and cool to every ensemble. src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597969390050-image.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Fall is almost here and while I am sad to have to say goodbye to summer, the current contents of my <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/the-best-amazon-fashion\" target=\"_blank\">Amazon shopping cart </a>are convincing me the change of the season won't be so bad. <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/cheap-fall-basics\" target=\"_blank\">Fall 2020 </a>has many fun <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/grunge-trend-fall-2020\" target=\"_blank\">new trends </a>in store, and while I would love to throw down on all of the latest and greatest designer pieces, I find that an affordable Amazon shopping spree feeds me more. Since navigating the retailer that appears to have never-ending amounts of products can be overwhelming, I went ahead and did the heavy lifting for you. </p><p>Here, you will find my small but mighty list of the 25 random but cute fall items I'm buying on Amazon. From pleated mini skirts to blazers and back again, this list stocks up on some of the heaviest hitters of the season, you'll see. </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597966317512-main.1200x1599uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This classic blazer is something you'll find yourself reaching for more often than not this season. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597949828563-main.1313x1100uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Buying this skirt in every color wouldn't be a bad idea. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597950468226-main.1600x1600uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A sweater that looks vintage, but isn't. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597952149690-main.1798x2251uc.jpg\"><figcaption>In case you haven't heard, Amazon is the best place to stock up on cheap chain jewelry. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597950143814-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Toughen up any fall look with ease by slipping into these chunky soles. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597950287401-main.1969x2560uc.jpg\"><figcaption>You can't go wrong with the essentials. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597960166470-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Swap all of your summertime hair accessories for ones with darker hues. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288730/fall-shopping-on-amazon-288730-1597951352486-main.1230x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>These pants plus that white Polo sweater and the Dr. Martens would be such a vibe. 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"Makeup Artists Say These 6 Moisturizers Will Age You in Reverse","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/BwG0GAIlXd4/best-anti-aging-moisturizers","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588275891912-main.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>\"<a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/kate-bosworth-beauty-secrets\" target=\"_blank\">Benjamin Buttoning</a>.\" Aging backward. Stopping time. If there's one effect or buzzword that elicits the same visceral reaction from beauty editors, skincare experts, and customers alike, it's anything with the term <em><a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-affordable-anti-ageing-products\" target=\"_blank\">anti-aging</a></em> in it. The truth of the matter is this: There's no miracle cream, gel, serum, or treatment that has the power to actually reverse or halt the signs of aging on the skin. (Sorry, fam, it just doesn't exist.) That said, there are a small number of products that come pretty close, and we're about to share an edit of them below.</p><p>Per a roster of <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/makeup-tips-to-look-younger\" target=\"_blank\">celebrity makeup artists</a>—Emily Cheng, Naoko Scintu, and Emma White Turle—we're uncovering a curated selection of the best anti-aging moisturizers. The keyword here being <em>curated</em> because according to them, not every cream or moisturizer on the market works the same. Luckily, they find that the below six do wield high-performing effects that plump and lift the skin and combat fine lines and wrinkles. So without further ado, keep scrolling to discover what makes each one so beloved and a few of the other products they recommend building out your routine with as well.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267211388-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Turle introduced this cream to me by saying that it's considered a scientific masterpiece and that she's inclined to agree. I was immediately intrigued. \"This lifts the skin from the first use,\" she explained. \"And over a few weeks of use, lines are diminished and skin is brighter. It’s very rich but very light and works beautifully under makeup. The driest and most tired of skin is immediately revived with this. I hide this from my husband.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267206201-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Another anti-aging gem Turle swears by? Susanne Kaufmann's Face Fluid. \"This is a moisturizer where they’ve harnessed natural skincare with science to create a formidably powerful, light, easily absorbed moisturizer,\" she shared. \"Susanne’s anti-aging range is quite remarkable and gives significant long-term effects as well as hydrating skin immediately. I would use this every day, let it absorb for a few minutes, and then apply makeup. You don’t need a primer, as it creates a perfect canvas that holds your makeup.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588275999708-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267553968-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Turle insists that massage is a key factor in anti-aging. She broke down the benefits of facial massage tools, explaining, \"Apart from dispersing fluid that can gather around the eyes and jawline, this stimulates blood flow to facial muscles, to help to heal, and to ease away tension. I like to use a gua sha or a facial roller.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267548271-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Both of these will lift the face and smooth out the lines. The roller works wonderfully around the eye area to massage away jet lag, wine, or insomnia. I always have them in my kit bag,\" Turle noted.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588275997064-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268050787-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"My mom has the most beautiful skin and swears by SK-II,\" shared Cheng. \"She loves the essence paired with this R.N.A. power anti-aging face cream. She struggles mostly with sunspots and firmness, which she and I have seen vastly improve since she started the duo. She is also particular about scents and has pretty sensitive skin. A win for her!\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268044202-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Cheng and her mom recommend supercharging the anti-aging powers of the above SK-II cream, or really any cream, with that of a facial essence like this one from the same line. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267899048-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Cheng shared that she's currently in Vancouver, having stayed put much longer than planned, and completely ran out of all her usual favorite skincare products. \"I was lucky enough to get my hands on Dior's Le Micro-Caviar de Rose Gelée,\" she told us, \"which is not something I would normally go for because rose isn't my favorite scent. However, I gave it a go, and I am so pleasantly surprised. I find that I get very dehydrated skin in Vancouver, and it usually takes forever for my skin to go back to normal. I used the cream and within two days noticed a huge difference. The dry patches dissipated. I'm all about prevention at this point. Fine lines and wrinkles appear the drier your skin is, so keeping hydrated is key for me. It's been about a week now, and all the dry patches are gone, I have not broken out (which I usually do with new products because my skin is so sensitive), and overall it feels firm and super soft. Right now I use this day and night alone with a prescription acne creme for blemishes.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588276160466-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588267856171-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Cheng says that SPF is the name of the game. \"In the day, I apply Glossier's sunscreen or Dr. Barbara Sturm's sun drops over top, which is a must,\" she said. \"I massage my moisturizer thoroughly into my skin and neck and wait for it to absorb before applying sunscreen.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268461797-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Cheng recommends applying your SPF (yes, even if you're staying indoors!) over your moisturizer and ensuring both are absorbed into the skin.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268577566-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"The first few days when I was extremely dry with more intense dry patches, I applied Dr. Barbara Sturms hyaluronic acid before the gelée,\" Cheng noted. This particular serum is a beauty-editor favorite, but if you're not looking to spend a ton on one, we have the intel on an equally well-loved $7 HA serum.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588276002172-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588269058406-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Scintu, the makeup artist behind a number of your favorite celebrity looks, tells us, \"I love this moisturizer as its deeply hydrating and also helps rebuild the skin to make it more youthful in appearance. It also encourages the production of collagen, which we all cannot get enough of! It actually makes the skin firmer and plumper, which is what I look for in a great moisturizer. I apply a pea-size amount to my fingertips and rub in to the face using an upward circular motion.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588285097403-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Scintu shared another favorite of hers, Sisley's Youth Protector. \"I love a good moisturizer that contains SPF. As we all know, anti-aging prevention is best for youthful-looking skin. I love Sisley's Youth Protector, which contains an SPF 30 and is also a perfect base for makeup. You don't need a primer with this product, and it contains gorgeous ingredients that nourish and protect the skin. I like to use this over the Omoressence in the morning for maximum hydration and protection with the two products combined. Just make sure you allow the Omoressence to soak into the skin completely before applying the Sisley Youth Protector.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588276164011-image.1200x1365uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588269138380-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I actually love using this moisturizer in combination with Blue Diamond Concentrate serum, also from Omorovicza,\" Scintu shared. \"This serum just seems to fill in those fine lines, which I think makes the skin look the best it can. It’s all about hydration—the plumper the skin is, the healthier it appears.\" In addition to the concentrate serum, she also loves the Omoressence, which is actually a hydrating essence. \"I love to use this on my clients and also on myself. It contains all those repairing minerals from the hot springs in Budapest. Pat this product in to clean skin, ready for your moisturizer of choice.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268813809-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Cheng's three-step routine for moisturizing with the most benefits? \"First, make sure your skin is well cleansed before you apply. If you are on the drier side, use a hydrating toner or essence before moisturizer. Then, gently massage moisturizer into your skin so that it fully absorbs, gets blood circulation going, and the product won't just be sitting on the surface.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287029/best-anti-aging-moisturizers-287029-1588268864828-product.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>If you're looking for a do-it-all toner that hydrates, calms, and refreshes, look no further than Caudalie's cult-favorite elixir, which you can apply whenever or wherever, on clean skin, on top of makeup, or really at any point in your routine.</figcaption></figure></p><p><em>Next: <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-anti-aging-night-creams\" target=\"_blank\">My 68-Year-Old Mom Says These Anti-Aging Night Creams Are So Worth Evolution","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/0gBaVCaImAQ/ashley-benson-style","description":"<p><span>“Oh God!” Ashley Benson nearly falls backward when we show her a red carpet photo from 2006. It’s the summer premiere of </span><em><span>Monster House</span></em><span> and she is wearing a black lace camisole, pleated mini skirt, and black pumps. A long knotted pearl necklace and marbled pink resin cuff finish the look. It’s a far cry from the elevated style we’ve come to know and love of Benson in recent years, but hey, it was 2006 and what was considered “in fashion” was very different back then, so let’s cut her some slack. </span></p><p><span>I'm playing one of my favorite Who What Wear games with the actress, </span><em><span>Would You Wear It Now</span></em><span>, via Zoom and getting the back story on some of her favorite (a gorgeous Hugo Boss coat worn as a dress) and not-so-favorite (a button-down chambray Zara number) looks from the past 14 years. And while she’s had quite the fashion evolution, one thing that has never changed for Benson is her impeccable taste in eyewear. Whether it’s a classic aviator, something more modern, or a sleek round style, she knows good sunnies. So much so, in fact, she became a founding partner of the eyewear brand </span><a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=ANppHEagv7h0OeXJHmPfCqugqTkoCXwnKHusSg3Oe63_cTd-lroJ1g\"><span>Privé Revaux</span></a><span>. And she, along with fellow actor Matt Bomer, are the brains behind </span><a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=XmWyUNMYR0uZAGVzJPliiycSLRulPhjF-AP9HSgKoje9gtNaYOF42Q\"><span>Privé</span></a><span>’s latest capsule collection, a gender-neutral line featuring five new designs. </span></p><p><span>The first-time collaboration is available online now and just in time to take a fun walk down fashion memory lane with the </span><em><span>Pretty Little Liars</span></em><span> star, so check out the video below and shop the Bomer x Benzo collection.</span></p><p><figure><img Trends","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/d1sgKD1RVLg/french-swimsuit-trends","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076650743-image.1080x1349uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">Summer has finally arrived in <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/french-fashion-brands\" target=\"_blank\">Paris</a>, and with the warmer days come new wonderings: Which swimwear trend should I adopt this summer? Personally, I’ve been addicted to swimwear trends basically my whole life, with a tendency (which is not <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/french-style-fashion-rules-2014\" target=\"_blank\">super French</a>, I have to admit) to follow them a little blindly and carelessly. But years passing and my body changing brought me to ask myself the following question: Is it really reasonable to give in to every single Instagram trend when it comes to swimwear? Here are some thoughts and my swimsuit picks for summer.</span></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076652679-image.1080x1349uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">It’s true there are some very cool brands that came through thanks to Instagram (and I’m the first to wear them), but I believe that when it comes to swimwear, it’s good to always have a classic or two in your luggage. For instance, in France, Eres is <em>the </em>classic brand that women have been wearing for generations. Now, I know the pieces are pricey, but at the same time, they are totally worth it and are the quintessence of classic French chic. Of course, no one has to rob a bank to get a suit, and there are affordable alternatives that we could also consider classic and timeless. Here are some examples.</span></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076993395-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076868867-main.1000x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594077059080-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078020253-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Bikini Briefs ($140).</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078118909-main.920x1380uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076656183-image.1080x1349uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">Crochet bikinis and other Instagram-friendly trends are cool, but nothing beats basics. Another brand that I’ve been in love with is Matteau Swim. I’ve been following it since the very beginning, and what I love is that it provides good options for a lot of body types. In my case, I lost quite a few pounds between last summer and this year, yet the suits still fit me like a glove.</span></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594077314818-main.1001x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Bikini Bottoms ($40)</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078187712-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Bikini Bottoms ($99).</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594079498886-main.920x1380uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Cancun Bikini Briefs ($71).</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594079848220-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594079884154-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076657891-image.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>I could not address this topic without including a bit of cliché in it, right? Whenever I’m bored with basics and classics, I like to wear some printed suits. And not just any prints: Polka dots (duh), pink gingham, and vintage flowery prints are my go-tos. </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078599780-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching Bikini Bottoms ($78).</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078294847-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078515615-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Shop the matching High-Waisted Bikini Bottoms ($12).</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594078366460-main.1391x1854uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594079111960-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/257999/french-swimsuit-trends-257999-1594076656888-image.1080x1349uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p class=\"p1\"><span class=\"s1\">There’s no better time than the summer to have a little fun. To me, Hunza G (another cool “Insta brand”) embodies this perfectly, and whenever I come across one of its beautifully art-directed photos, I think of Elle Macpherson, of course, but also of Stéphanie de Monaco (for those who don’t know her, I encourage you to google her). The whole vibe just reminds me of the ’80s, a time when showing a curvier figure was the norm.</span></p><p><figure><img 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"Yes, Bloomers are the \"Ugly\" Underwear We Can No Longer Ignore","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/9imLtiBMq6o/bloomers-underwear-trend","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597266231979-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Well, 2020 has sure thrown us some curveballs. While there were plenty of trends we fully expected to happen this year, we still find ourselves surprised by a few newcomers that have seemingly arrived out of the blue. With everyone <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/loungewear-capsule-wardrobe\" target=\"_blank\">prioritizing loungewear</a> these days, the latest trend to hit the scene is one that's comfortable, easy, and a little unexpected: bloomers. Yep, bloomers are the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/briefs-underwear-trend\" target=\"_blank\">new underwear trend</a> that's gaining steam and you're about to understand why.</p><p>Historically, bloomers were long shorts to wear underneath skirts and dresses, but the modern-day iterations translate to charming ruffled lounge shorts and shirred underwear. Less literal bloomers, more bloomer <em>vibes</em>. Get the idea? To see what I mean, I'm sharing a multitude of outfit photos and even some recent runway evidence that showcase how bloomers are evolving into a loungewear and lingerie item that actually makes sense for 2020.</p><p>Although more of a micro-trend, bloomers did, in fact, pop up on the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/spring-fashion-trends-2020\" target=\"_blank\">spring runways</a> this year. At Khaite, they were part of a three-piece plaid set and appeared ready for a warm-weather getaway, while Tibi's gave off more of a vintage feel with their below-the-knee hem.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597263073858-image.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597263072613-image.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597201906533-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This image is actually what sparked the idea for this story. Here, Camille Charrière wore a pair of the Khaite shorts that read as literal bloomers. One commenter even called them \"diaper shorts,\" which made me laugh. Cute but controversial.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597260101028-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597201914872-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Now, this is a summer lingerie trend if we've seen one. Shirred briefs aren't technically bloomers, but they give off that comfy, loungy bloomer vibe, if you know what I mean.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img 08/25/02-13-12-801_6d3926fe9e52f254.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288597/bloomers-underwear-trend-288597-1597201915962-image.850x1275uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn82@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-20-872_1ed939066502732a.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/9imLtiBMq6o":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn84@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-14-35-417_9e570ee33e3ee153.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581864},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"A Dermatologist Ranked the 3 Worst Body-Lotion Mistakes","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/Jf9f0ork5k8/best-anti-aging-body-lotions","description":"<p>If there's anything I'm very strict about when it comes to my <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/beauty-routine-age-30\" target=\"_blank\">beauty routine</a>, it's my body lotion. I might forget a step in my <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/moonlit-skincare-review\" target=\"_blank\">nighttime skincare routine</a>, but I never forget to put body lotion on after I shower or in the mornings, even I don't shower. For the most part, it's paid off. Aside from the occasional <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-products-for-eczema\" target=\"_blank\">eczema flare-up</a> on my hands, arms, or neck, I have pretty smooth skin. </p><p>But since I'm a curious person and like to question everything, I wanted to know if there were some things I was missing when it comes to body-lotion application. So I reached out to dermatologist <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=URvnfHL4X42JBVAWkjSDdR3MZjVB60hqWqOsB88ountGoz4hc1Qcvw3VW9aW53pGXb8jY9MRik7Wh9AWWDux8Qh0lBbxtVmnCqf0qBj-\" target=\"_blank\">Naissan O. Wesley, MD</a>, FACMS, of Skin Care and Laser Physicians of Beverly Hills to get her tips and to see what role body lotions play in reducing premature aging or the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/french-anti-ageing-skincare-products\" target=\"_blank\">signs of aging</a>. Because you've always got to be on the offense when it comes to protecting your skin, right?</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1598292628198-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>In general, the guideline for applying <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-body-lotions-for-dry-skin\" target=\"_blank\">body lotion</a> is pretty simple. \"I recommend applying body lotion daily,\" Wesley says. \"If recently showered, the best time to apply is within three to five minutes after a bath or shower to help trap moisture in and restore the skin barrier that may have been disrupted by soap or cleansers.\"</p><p>While it seems straightforward, there are some mistakes you can make with body lotion. Wesley outlined these three for me:</p><p><strong>1. Not Applying Enough:</strong> Don't be stingy with the stuff. Of course, you don't need to empty the whole bottle onto your body, but be generous with how much you apply.</p><p><strong>2. Not Applying It All Over:</strong> One example Wesley gives is putting lotion on your upper body but forgetting about your legs. Make sure you're moisturizing every inch of your body.</p><p><strong>3. Applying a Lotion That Isn't Moisturizing Enough: </strong>This might depend on <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/how-to-fix-uneven-skin-texture\" target=\"_blank\">your skin type</a> or needs. Overall, you'll want to choose a product that contains the nutrients, vitamins, and ingredients that will keep your skin hydrated for a while. \"I prefer to use body lotions that contain natural and fewer unnecessary ingredients,\" Wesley says. \"One that is creamier or has a lotion mixed with oil I find to often have longer moisturizing effects than a thinner, more watery lotion that just tends to evaporate off the skin surface. Ingredients such as shea butter, cold-pressed oils, borage seed oil, and/or fatty acids such as ceramides tend to have great barrier-protecting properties.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593053403600-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>One thing I didn't realize about body lotions? They can play a big role in protecting your skin against the signs of aging. Here I was just honing in on the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-retinol-eye-creams\" target=\"_blank\">eye creams</a>, serums, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-anti-aging-face-oils\" target=\"_blank\">face oils</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-anti-aging-night-creams\" target=\"_blank\">night creams</a> of the skincare world and not even thinking that my body-lotion habit could also be helping maintain youthful-looking and firm skin.</p><p>\"The skin often tends to appear more wrinkled when it's drier,\" Wesley explains. \"Thus the same moisture-enhancing and barrier-protecting ingredients above also help reduce the appearance of wrinkles. Additionally, topical antioxidants can be helpful to repair free radicals created from sun and environmental damage, and peptide ingredients can be useful to help support collagen.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593053707042-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>As for application watch-outs, Wesley says you can apply it as often as it feels good, as long as you don't have <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/acne-skincare-routine\" target=\"_blank\">acne-prone skin</a> and the lotion isn't clogging pores. Regardless of whether you have <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-foundation-for-mature-skin\" target=\"_blank\">mature skin</a> or not, Wesley says application frequency will depend on the climate of where you live because cold, dry, and windy conditions might require more moisture support. Other factors include exposure to hard water and soap and any underlying conditions like eczema or thyroid disorders.</p><p>\"For mature, dry skin, applying lotion morning and evening would be appropriate, especially after bathing,\" she advises. \"Applying a thicker, creamier lotion as opposed to a thin, more watery topical would be recommended.\"</p><p>Take a look at some anti-aging body lotions recommended by Wesley and our editors below.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593057284352-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This body lotion contains 12% glycolic alpha hydroxy acid, which helps with collagen production and reduces the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. It also works to slough off dead skin cells, while vitamins and nutrients leave the skin moisturized. Because it contains AHA, you should be careful with your sun exposure and wear sunscreen.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593057559400-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Though on the pricier side, Dr. Barbara Sturm's body cream is really worth it. Formulated with antioxidants, white almond, and elderberry blossom, the lotion will tighten skin and diminish the signs of aging. It's also quickly absorbed and ultra hydrating.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1595442142162-main.2048x2048uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This body balm both tightens skin and reduces the appearance of sun damage. It has botanical ingredients like lemon, safflower, and coconut oils.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593053836048-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1595441504850-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Skinceuticals's concentrate is all about firming up your skin. Apply it to your abdomen, buttocks, knees, and thighs for a visibly lifted look. Ingredients include peptides, yeast extract, and rice protein.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593057952972-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Caudalie's body lotion not only hydrates the skin, but it also prevents premature aging by promoting microcirculation. Ingredients include hyaluronic acid, shea butter, and organic grape water.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593058202865-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>At just $15, Olay's anti-aging body lotion is an effective drugstore option. 5-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn22@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-13-24-446_5bee3c1cf57f2e38.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593058274378-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn37@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-14-17-820_9e7cbbb68fbe8d37.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593054002945-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn61@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-07-535_ee01f84bb8550eff.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593058488491-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn73@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-13-24-146_72e9c7e5e3905e8d.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593058723687-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn81@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-13-34-930_4b245e84d29eace5.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593058885643-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn86@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-14-32-896_663161af5cfb46f8.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593059056393-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn48@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-13-53-098_c900e77a8c43cd82.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593054414272-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn46@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-13-24-595_e510fabe84f7488c.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593059107340-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn21@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-14-23-664_689e11bd36ce91da.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287912/best-anti-aging-body-lotions-287912-1593059300418-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn50@2020_4/2020/08/25/02-14-16-251_a372795001d037fa.webp","h 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"People Don't Believe My Mom Is 71—Here Are 8 Anti-Aging Serums She Uses","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/E7eQjEDrDnI/best-anti-aging-serums","description":"<p>Six years ago, my family experienced a huge scare when my then 65-year-old mom was rushed to the ER in order to receive an emergency cardioversion—aka a medical paddle used to restart her heart. The day before the trip to the emergency room, we'd been traveling, and my mom (who has since discovered she has an extreme sensitivity to sugar) had a pumpkin spice latte and an almond-filled French pastry for breakfast and then later on after dinner a small vanilla ice cream cone. As she explains, it was enough sugar (at least for her) to send her heart into atrial fibrillation, or an uneven heart rhythm.</p><p>\"As scary as the experience was, it turned out to be a blessing in disguise,\" she tells me. \"I banished heavy sugar doses from my diet and noticed that my skin started looking better. Soon after this, I forced myself to watch a program on PBS I’d recorded called <em>The Age Fix</em>, hosted by plastic surgeon Anthony Youn (and later read <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=bsWysJfu6-SBbZnMaQZJHNABAQuDOrIe0LGWbhgxNT_OabSitKrDHzSWoOX4iHreTy5pKwPQFut8umHnbceGoaqKNOWP\" target=\"_blank\">his book by the same name</a>). I’d resisted watching the show because I knew it wouldn’t be my personal choice to go the route of plastic surgery when it came to age prevention, but as <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=wcTO5QnrlLvfSOCRZtWKMZcYuigVpNyhrk6aUTZMsGECmaD2Ze7mnLFEZMa7aUX1Pmo\" target=\"_blank\">a makeup artist who specializes in helping women over 50</a>, I felt like there could be some helpful information.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663695666-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>As my mom told me over the phone, Youn connected the dots for her when he said the most important thing we can do for our skin is to eat a clean, healthy diet, and sugar basically equals wrinkles. So as my mom began to reduce her sugar intake and make healthier choices when it came to meals and snacking, her skin started looking better and better, and she became more interested in what else she could do to help some age-related redness, dark spots, fine lines, and not-so-fine lines that were becoming ever harder to miss when she looked in the mirror each morning. (Her words, not mine!)</p><p>\"Frankly, I’m also embarrassed to admit I’d never done much besides a morning facial cleanse in the shower, some moisturizer under my makeup, and an evening cleanse,\" she laughs. \"But as I started checking into skin-enhancing serums and products that might benefit my skin, I realized that to get the best results from these products, I needed to make sure these formulations could penetrate deeply into my skin. I purchased a <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=hQd-jRaWWGKOJJm1VKPp3cOEnyw3bBzsaR-j5Z7WUVbM6K6_UU1lTvFmibWeY2pFbbzAgnFejAS6c2uzZx8L7SF6T1ie2NaA3Pruk6HDq40t7fGGW1B3O-1gmSh-w2yj51V-ophG1VUKKwVKWD2-E2yafSa72JO0ag\" target=\"_blank\">Clarisonic Brush</a> ($50) which, according to research, can get your skin six times cleaner than a normal cleansing routine, and I began to add a few other exfoliating skincare products into my regimen as well.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663705601-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>However, it wasn't until my mom began introducing various anti-aging serums into her skincare routine that she says she truly began to notice a difference in the appearance of her skin. \"I also switched to a natural moisturizer—Essentiel by Adele <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=WvKo9Q5_XiIk2tpq50vlPrPfIKqvs6k4aktKPPDmRrCjhCzCqOAIi4g2Zf2Os36Ah_KgnwURFVWQdok\" target=\"_blank\">Moisture</a> ($39) is pure heaven—which has made my routine a bit cleaner and has been a game changer in terms of my skin's hydration levels, especially since we spend our winters in the Arizona desert.\"</p><p>So are you curious to know the specifics of my mom's anti-aging skincare routine and her favorite serums? Keep scrolling! Ahead, she's sharing the best anti-aging serums and formulas that have actually made a difference in the way her skin looks and feels.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663717143-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I know this serum gets talked about all the time, but there's a reason it's so iconic. It works. If I could only use one anti-aging serum for the rest of my life, it would probably be this one. It's literally changed the clarity, brightness, tone, and texture of my skin ever since I started using it. I combine it with the two serums below, and it's my own fountain-of-youth cocktail.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663727806-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"This serum is a triple threat and features coenzyme Q10 (an antioxidant that boosts collagen production, which we need when we're aging!) in addition to hyaluronic acid for hydration, and Matrixyl 3000, an amazing anti-wrinkle ingredient that's used as a less harsh alternative to retinol. This serum has really helped decrease my redness and some of the uneven patches that used to bother me on my complexion.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663740070-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"As I mentioned, I like to mix this serum from Timeless with the above two for a super-charged serum mixture. It features Matrixyl Synthe'6, a powerful peptide that, according to the brand, boosts six skin-rebuilding essentials. It's great for wrinkles, and it's helped reduce some of the fine lines on my face and crepiness around my eyes.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663750919-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"This essence-serum hybrid is definitely an investment. However, it really helps hydrate and condition the skin, and I've also seen improvements in the firmness and how plump and youthful my skin looks since I added it to my normal routine. Essentially, it's a treatment you apply after you cleanse and tone, and it acts kind of like a serum primer—enhancing the benefits of whatever serum you use afterward—while also utilizing nutrient-rich caviar water to make your pores looks smooth and tiny.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663757704-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Ohhhhh, this one is so, so good, and it's definitely made my skin look brighter and plumper—fewer fine lines and less sagginess! It's really lightweight, which I like. So many anti-aging products can get really heavy and cloying feeling. It features a specialized Line Relaxing Complex. It's also really hydrating, and I don't even feel like I need a moisturizer after I apply it.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663763901-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I really noticed a difference with this serum—especially regarding an improvement in the firmness of my skin and the overall tone of my skin. I'm a big fan of SkinCeuticals, and this newish product has been a favorite recently. Dr. Barbara Sturm makes a handful of really luxurious and high-quality serums, but it's this anti-aging formula, in particular, that's been a real game changer for my skin. I've only just started to use it, but I definitely like some of the results I'm starting to see with this product.\" </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663782825-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I love this gentle polish from Tatcha for keeping my skin clean, soft, and congestion-free. Erin first introduced me to Tatcha a couple of years ago, and while everything from the brand is really beautiful, this has become one of my ride-or-die skincare products to help with aging. I use it a couple of times per week, and it's really made a difference in the texture and brightness of my skin.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/280115/best-anti-aging-serums-280115-1558663790895-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I'm really picky when it comes to lotions and moisturizers and was, admittedly, skeptical of this multipurpose formula when Erin (who's obsessed) brought it home with her about a year ago. It's pure heaven, infused with so many wonderful ingredients, and I like to use it all over my body, face, and hands. Even my husband is obsessed with it! For","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/KAc79lhUEhE/lunya-loungewear","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597874933880-main.1200x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Look good, feel good… right? Well, I started last week with the intention of getting dressed up in the mornings as if I were going into the office, but by day two, I knew that there was absolutely no way this could last. I gave it a shot, but my heart truly lies in staying comfortable. With that being said, my old sweats and baggy tees just weren't making me feel like the fashionable Who What Wear editor I am, so I did a little research to find comfy clothes that would actually make me look and feel chic while at home.</p><p>That's when I found <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=XCLVZTPubrCPiKAgC8DwS82j_U0F4v40SyGwUoIuHmAPTlZ8HSTEx4PHrS09yVpcNacmtbqgNhsgElDEUhAR1813KWNm7Z7vi6dg8lubpCOzCB8bA58-jJu4Rb-AZqnszwR8KoWZzYc3jaIzHHxySrbavGmpV2exXXj_WqayGAEpe38\" target=\"_blank\">Lunya</a>, the loungewear brand that makes extremely stylish clothes for staying inside (aka <em>the</em> holy grail), and now I constantly see my Instagram feed full of cool girls wearing the label—and for good reason. Its collection of robes, nightgowns, sets, and more is so luxurious and elevated, I had to actually restrain myself from adding everything to my cart. (<em>Especially</em> the washable silk collection, which would let me ditch the dry cleaner and wash my silks myself—a true miracle!) Keep scrolling for all of the pretty pieces to make you feel good in bed and beyond.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596561264291-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>The color, the front pocket, the fabric, the fact that it's so oversized—I will be living in this.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597370950152-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This makes me immediately want to draw myself a bath and order macarons from my favorite bakery.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596561298078-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I can already see myself trying to leave the house in this with a pair of strappy sandals.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873148261-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Same with this one. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596561302996-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I've never wanted to sleep in a jumpsuit more.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596561256170-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A good silky tank-and-shorts set is always a must.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596561308395-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Okay, don't knock a sleep mask until you try it. Not only does it completely block out the light while you sleep (I'm all about a good night's rest), but this mask is also made out of moisturizing silk, so it's actually a beauty treatment while you rest.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873154092-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This set just makes me so excited for bedtime.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873159957-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Just an easy tank to throw on whether you're lounging about or heading out.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873166913-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I don’t think I’ve ever been more obsessed with a romper. I’m getting matching ones for my roommate and me to wear for after-work drinks on the couch.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597370966292-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>My search for a new pair of biker shorts is officially over. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596562483829-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I don't have air conditioning in my apartment, so this bralette is about to be my go-to.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1596562469009-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Along with these breezy shorts. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873175130-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Pair these with sneakers or just some fuzzy socks—you really can’t go wrong.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288479/lunya-loungewear-288479-1597873179034-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Can you ever have too many leggings? Weather","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/csXMd9jnII4/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather","description":"<p class=\"p1\">Some people will tell you that <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=65W9wpo-6R3q_PED8lwvcmJq-vbmpNVIFlCt70yQ9gHH5USVdQcQYdBTFzvEjKuyYSgHJEF8NybfUz4\" target=\"_blank\">April 25 is the ideal date</a> for <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/what-to-wear-in-70-degree-weather\" target=\"_blank\">mild temperatures</a>. But we’ll agree to disagree. Coming up soon, that 60-degree seasonal transition is certainly <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/what-to-wear-in-50-degree-weather\" target=\"_blank\">weather at its best</a>. But it’s also a time that requires some painfully strategic layers: enough to stay warm but not so much coverage that your style gets completely muffled in the mix.</p><p class=\"p1\">So what should you specifically put on when your weather app reads in the 60s? The seven combinations below hit the mark, incorporating cozy knits, wool coats, and long-length hems. Read on, and don’t wait too long to try all the combinations. Winter’s just around the corner, so here are seven outfit combinations to wear in 60-degree weather.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1508175241622-image.1769x2700uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Leave the jacket at home—this almost completely covered look is all you need.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597808176188-main.2000x3642uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597808513504-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597809824397-main.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Pair these breezy, tailored pieces together for an effortless, seasonally appropriate ensemble.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597808701406-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597810235415-main.1001x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597876009294-main.3648x5472uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Denim is a year-round staple but we particularly love it in autumn when paired with warm beige and brown hues. Style a wide-leg style with a button-down shirt and boots.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597876417615-main.1001x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597876362424-main.1080x1372uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597876649150-main.1200x1800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A modest midi dress is perfect when paired with a blazer or lightweight wool coat—extra points for doing so in an eye-catching color combination.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597877177761-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597877340613-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1508175609585-image.1235x1886uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Before you break out the heavy-duty wools, use a silk scarf to cover up once temps take a teeny-tiny drop.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597877434364-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597877829105-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/238952/what-to-wear-in-60-degree-weather-238952-1597878883437-main.1080x1350uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Don't put that summer skirt away just yet. 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez Uses a $20 Amazon Dupe for a Cult-Favorite Moisturizer","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/a-UzWnt6ql4/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598047004810-main.0x800uc.png\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Like I mentioned last week when I discussed <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/kamala-harris-style\" target=\"_blank\">Kamala Harris's signature accessory</a>, talking about a woman's fashion or beauty choices shouldn't detract from their achievements. Whoever said you can't talk about someone's style <em>and</em> substance? This is a sentiment that congresswoman Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez also stands behind. </p><p>Today, <em>Vogue</em> released a new video where AOC went through her entire skincare and makeup routine. \"There's this false idea that if you care about makeup or if your interests are in beauty and fashion that that's somehow frivolous,\" she said in the video. \"But I actually think these are some of the most substantive decisions that we make, and we make them every morning.\" Amen to that. She also waxed poetic on the importance of one crucial skincare step: \"Don't play games with <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/suncare-skin-routine\" target=\"_blank\">sunscreen</a>,\" she said. </p><p>While watching her routine, one of her products stood out to me: the Acure <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/z1FaHUGiQ?w=3696345\" target=\"_blank\">Radically Rejuvenating Whipped Night Cream</a> ($20), which is available to buy on Amazon and boasts 207 five-star reviews. Multiple reviews mention that it's a great affordable dupe for the cult-favorite Drunk Elephant <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=VvqpBFRbFtb7wt0MgnM2eG46ESAGQrcKvMwWrdzY3272LB8K8O0HOp3gXmGe6XapR3HIoQH8_vXY\" target=\"_blank\">Protini Polypeptide Moisturizer</a> ($68) because it's so hydrating and contains many of the same ingredients, including peptides and birrea seed oil. I also love that she uses Glossier's iconic <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=KF5tXAQjGNDZqm0FVBJ0ftD0VACI4zyJ9662sstvTpj-71yFVzWZPZzUSB5RlGpE3g\" target=\"_blank\">Cloud Paint Cream Blush</a> ($18)—specifically the Dusk shade. Scroll down to watch the full video and shop AOC's exact skincare and makeup products.</p><p><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/bXqZllqGWGQ\" frameborder=\"0\" allow=\"accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture\" allowfullscreen></iframe></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598038829663-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>AOC says she uses this toner as her very first skincare step. She lightly presses it into her skin using her fingers.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598038915106-main.1125x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This has over 200 five-star reviews on Amazon because customers think it's incredibly moisturizing and soothing. Reviewers even say it's a great dupe for Drunk Elephant's Protini Polypeptide Moisturizer ($68). </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598044022284-main.1024x1024uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Don't play games with sunscreen,\" Ocasio-Cortez said in the video. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598042677168-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>I also personally use this concealer and can attest to its natural look and longevity. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598042865234-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>AOC says she uses this foundation when she has a long day of meetings and appearances. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598043988924-main.0x800uc.png\"><figcaption>She also alternates using this tinted moisturizer as a lighter option for a foundation. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598046223687-product.886x1043uc.jpg\"><figcaption>As seen in the video, AOC specifically uses the Dusk shade of this popular cream blush. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288752/alexandria-ocasio-cortez-skincare-routine-288752-1598044173599-image.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>Gotta love a Rihanna fan. </figcaption></figure></p><p>Next, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/kamala-harris-style\" target=\"_blank\">Kamala Harris has been wearing her signature accessory for $35 years</a>. </p><img
