10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"The 9-Piece Fall Wardrobe That Defines Italian Fashion","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/uYtbBTVcN5M/italian-capsule-wardrobe","description":"<p class=\"p1\">When I think about <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/italian-fashion-girl-wardrobe\"><span class=\"s1\">Italian fashion</span></a>, a few things immediately come to mind: sophistication and experimentation. Italian women seem to have a knack for looking polished no matter what they’re wearing, but they also have a little fun with unexpected elements. Sure, you’ll see street style veteran Gilda Ambrosio pairing a classic button-down top and pencil skirt, but she’ll make it her own by wearing mismatched prints. And you can expect the same level of fun and creative styling from photographer Tamu McPherson, who is a master of layering different textures and colors.</p><p class=\"p1\">As we head into the season ahead, what can we expect to see the best-dressed Italian women wearing? When it comes to their fall closet staples, there a few key pieces Italian women tend to wear on repeat—from <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zGjg0GXI9?w=3695806\"><span class=\"s1\">sleek accessories</span></a> to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zwxQjjMLR?w=3695873\"><span class=\"s1\">strong tailoring</span></a> to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zRTFvDero?w=3683786\"><span class=\"s1\">bold prints</span></a>. Ahead, we’re narrowing in on the 9 Italian fall <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/italian-fashion-girl-wardrobe\"><span class=\"s1\">capsule wardrobe essentials</span></a> to tap into their style.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598028446462-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Whether paired with a long dress, Bermuda shorts, or a cinched trench, knee-high boots are the fall shoe staple Italian women are very behind. This season, opt for a pair finished with a sleek kitten heel.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598065060864-main.1128x2000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598065180928-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598065120943-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597972507842-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Ribbed knits are on the rise for fall, but it's a piece Italian women have been tuned into for a long time. A sophisticated, timeless piece that taps into the Italian heritage of knitwear, this is the wardrobe staple you'll be wearing for years to come.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597974242726-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597972730554-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597973146635-main.2100x2940uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1596214922360-image.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption>A flowy dress is the perfect transitional piece that's able to cross over from summer to fall. As you head into the new season, swap out your sandals for a pair of leather boots.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1596235101270-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1596235048905-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597962398030-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597969925797-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Whether you're looking at the collections Prada or Gucci or Fendi, you'll be sure to find cool, bold prints in their arsenal. A trademark of Italian design, you'll also find strong prints in the core wardrobes of Italian women.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597974659159-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598064454923-main.1024x1432uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598064506315-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597977844615-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Instead of tight legging-like leather pants, Italian women gravitate towards wider-cut trouser styles. With sharp tailoring and a polished feel, these are a fresh take on the wardrobe staple.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597979437650-main.824x1247uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597979380137-main.1001x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597978851729-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597879220739-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>One thing I learned after I moved to a colder climate a few years ago? Fall is all about a great coat. That's something Italian women certainly know about. So, what will we see this fall? Relaxed trousers, which are on the rise for the upcoming season. If you need inspiration for how to wear them, Tamu McPherson has them styled to perfection above.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598064597111-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598064818994-main.1151x1400uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1598064654409-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288438/italian-capsule-wardrobe-288438-1597979790655-main.1000x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Going hand-in-hand with relaxed trousers? Oversize blazers. This trend was huge last year but we'll continue to see the piece get wear this year.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=PVttbZkbjKNU6QL9enziJrGS8D8ssfW74mY3cA_dmxO-i680nkoo8tBUTFAu3f6TpLDFcbx2jywYJZ6-jEjBbwUKOcXsgv1QZvV9erSZnuhqFxIBnOxOUPn9LyZR5cOikPg-uivT_4L_az7-a4bjqBUoHiv3XA\" As we’ve highlighted this week, the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-nordstrom-items-under-100\" target=\"_blank\">mega blowout</a> offers <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/nordstrom-anniversary-sale-2020\" target=\"_blank\">majorly discounted prices on a plethora of coveted buys</a>. Today, we thought we’d highlight even more standouts from the event. In fact, we thought there could be interest in what one of our favorite follows, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=H0EmD_IvAhw_AAuMdc3kTV1RUBjpeWdL38hwa60DGNdrY2jrabr0mrzYVVd1aT2iWjKrlSg-Zw\" target=\"_blank\">Susie Wright</a>, thinks is A+ from the Anniversary Sale. After all, she is a former Nordstrom buyer, so it’s safe to say that she <em>gets</em> the merchandise and understands what's worth buying now. Oh, and she also happens to be 55. And no, age has nothing to do with what you should or shouldn’t wear, but that sartorial experience after years of style trial and error is also quite intriguing.</p><p>If you peep Wright’s site, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=4XbBIpFn6C7Jj1rQBleR09PzYxzGKxbLwfK0-WHfkX7dNoZLE8fK4DdH\" target=\"_blank\">So Susie</a>, you’ll see that she’s already been shopping the sale during the preview stage. Keep scrolling to uncover the six general categories Wright is shopping from Nordstrom right now, complete with a range of inspired products to suit a variety of styles. 4857670110-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn1@2020_5/2020/08/25/02-14-31-402_15a683ef4c6ba04d.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594854116975-main.1080x810uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn49@2020_2/2020/08/25/02-13-26-500_bdc6744ad5a4983e.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594857876933-main.1128x2000uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn98@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-19-562_fa90a92ea6bc7e94.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594852050180-main.1080x1349uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn58@2020_1/2020/08/25/02-14-19-264_274f5daf7a1caca3.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594857986134-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn41@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-14-28-831_57edf01fa836da26.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594854142587-main.1080x1350uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn73@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-14-14-941_a88647998da4506b.webp","https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288209/french-and-ny-girls-summer-shopping-288209-1594858190200-main.800x0uc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx5oss/cdn85@2020_3/2020/08/25/02-13-10-245_157cdcc136e8166e.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~4/FaA3rz8tPL0":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn62@2020_6/2020/08/25/02-13-33-983_8eeaba229b55965d.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598321581864},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"This 89-Year-Old Looks 25 Years Younger—Here Are 14 Skincare Items She Uses","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/9Rwi1zCeU4o/anti-aging-products","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592937111729-main.0x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>I've gotta say I think <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=yXuUILR-m10SR0krok2s8edoHfBQYUeW-TMvn1xSaQlM--etYgATkEiyNVfhl90Ao_L_CJI\" target=\"_blank\">Sara</a> and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=AxsI5XTZFhd_oWrA_siYUU4VdE7BdaJekUdyUWx-PssC1OXPBDEDmvGWZArCGukIFKVgB_Y\" target=\"_blank\">Erin Foster</a> are among the most entertaining people to follow on Instagram. From Sara's hilarious \"<a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=mgkOSKGNEuJW70vr3Ypt5y1HUxhIi45AQHMqHfAbTEbFt-8MozpajxviRAf1U_T42H_ezUDP8OI\" target=\"_blank\">Real Moms of TikTok</a>\" videos to Erin's <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=KmMYWkQWHrL508sKMT5xgaFvaPTIFfQmq3XHdolQDz_-CYSq5OnmXUHUIpgfdYZyn4NvCnwzZkA\" target=\"_blank\">self-deprecating humor</a> about marriage, they're definitely never boring. But one of the most memorable posts (to me, anyway) was when Erin shared a video of her maternal grandmother, Anita Marshall, last year and the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=K_ylJh1S6NDghLt7UwJlFpaBHvcopq0gIdvOPQuY3eNgRlDxyKsPFckjCQVYwL6I-bLodKHhP-g\" target=\"_blank\">comment section was inundated</a> with messages of disbelief that she was in her late 80s. \"Holy shit! What’s her secret there’s no way she’s 87!\" read one comment. \"She is not 87. My word. She looks <em>incroyable</em>!\" read another. </p><p>Naturally, I did what any <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-anti-aging-night-creams\" target=\"_blank\">skincare-obsessed editor</a> would do: go straight to the source and find out what she's been using on her skin. \"I've never had Botox or filler in my life,\" the now-89-year-old told Who What Wear. As for Nita's daily routine, it starts out with <strong>an incredibly affordable secret weapon she's been using for 40 years: the Buf-Puf <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zUe1D46sR?w=3659392\" target=\"_blank\">Facial Sponge</a> ($8).</strong> \"I get up in the morning and wash my face with cleanser and a Buf-Puf, which will make most people say '<em>Oh my word!'</em> Well, [my daughter Rebecca] was dating a doctor, and he told me this was the thing to use, and I just never stopped. I gently exfoliate with it. I use it religiously and have been for over 40 years.\" You can bet I already purchased one from Amazon before even sitting down to write this story.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592517519329-main.1200x1538uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>In general, Nita has three favorite skincare brands: \"I rotate through <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=6EVHyBxQZDOMDJ48NKpvxMVd5yKrrt42yLT-rmRoGPX74pr9J0JVuQ_OaXi9bM3wCEu2T9VOHqZ7\" target=\"_blank\">Pevonia Botanica</a>, <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=ynDdAU-tpHFYPOXECwgm5wi-SJBO6usVZmNwJ8nUMvQMA6RUT1EVKU0t5SX1T6qJBTlct2yvOnc62-5c43vv3iV41CY8jYBKc1gRuzSE8KY9qiOjwMaizw47JJh9OLCLRwgQUjlh9MVAi5mMdRP8YvFjNksTUgTsBGxJwuLDyCCEWgIhe7RSZb0f8vkYYfVmhaDY2eKflOASZZsPK6zGOpfCaQJm_GIAVw\" target=\"_blank\">La Prairie</a>, and <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zEbbCtuDg?w=3659846\" target=\"_blank\">Sothys</a>. After so long, my skin gets used to something, so I change it up.\" As for the specific cleanser she uses with her Buf-Puf, she alternates between Pevonia Botanica's <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/z5QF9JRvS?w=3659235\" target=\"_blank\">Myoxy-Caviar Timeless Balm Cleanser</a> ($47) and La Prairie's <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zhAC6K0Dl?w=3658547\" target=\"_blank\">Foam Cleanser</a> ($90). \"Then I use a toner or astringent, like the Pevonia <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zDO66ATsZ?w=3658507\" target=\"_blank\">Myoxy-Caviar Timeless Repair Lotion</a> ($40). Sometimes I use a <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/splash/zP6lDsVs1?w=3658477\" target=\"_blank\">witch hazel toner</a>,\" she told us. </p><p>I've listed her entire skincare collection below, but I also had to ask her what else she attributes her youthful appearance to, other than products. \"My mom made me wear a straw hat from the time I was very little to protect me from the sun,\" she told us. \"I swam every day only early in the morning so that I was never in the sun.\" She also thinks other additions to her daily beauty routine have helped. \"I’ve been doing acupuncture for a while and love it. There is a French facial I get [using Rothys products], and it's really tightened my pores. Less is more. I don’t do masks. I've never had Botox or filler in my life. Years ago, I did some microdermabrasion, and it wasn’t good for me.\" She also says she keeps spoons in her freezer to put them under her eyes when they start to sag. </p><p>Plus, Nita says you should never underestimate the power of positivity. \"I've just always had a fairly good attitude; I don't like a frown. I wake up every day with a good attitude. That smile on your face gets rid of wrinkles. It brightens up your day and someone else's day.\" Words to live by. Scroll down to shop the exact skincare items she uses. </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592504063742-image.1200x1069uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592510310133-main.1730x2111uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I swear by the Buf-Puf. I use it religiously and have been for over 40 years,\" Nita told us. It can be used with any cleanser and is great for gently exfoliating. Aside from her convincing recommendation, it also has hundreds of glowing reviews on Amazon, where everyone agrees that it's the \"best on the market\" and leaves skin incredibly smooth and glowy. There's also a gentler version of the facial sponge below if you're concerned it could be too harsh, but you should use a light touch with either of them. Plus, there's also a body sponge for exfoliating the rest of your skin.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592516208051-main.1489x1718uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This is the gentler version of Nita's beloved Buf-Puf for sensitive skin. Don't worry: It still has exfoliating powers in spades and is just as popular as the original. In addition to helping with glow and smoothness, many Amazon reviewers say it's great for keeping acne at bay. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592508700285-product.800x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Nita uses several products from Pevonia Botanica, which is an all-natural, clean skincare brand that uses only \"the purest marine and holistic botanical ingredients\" and never uses SLS, parabens, alcohol, artificial fragrances, or other harmful ingredients. Nita is particularly partial to Pevonia's Myoxy-Caviar line, which includes this cleanser that is ultra-hydrating thanks to caviar and apple-derived amino acids.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592442166533-main.1200x1798uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Nita owns a handful of La Prairie products, which are pricey but universally adored by beauty editors as well. Our beauty editor, Erin Jahns, declared that La Prairie is \"one of the most coveted holy-grail skincare brands on the market and belongs on your vanity at some point in your life.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592440739815-main.1500x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>As Nita explained above, she's a fan of witch hazel toner, which helps tighten pores, reduce inflammation, and moisturize, among other benefits. This one, in particular, is Amazon's best-selling toner and boasts over 12,000 reviews. Most commentators love how it helps with breakouts, redness, and uneven skin tone. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592441500580-product.800x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Pevonia was green before it was fashionable, launching in 1991 with cruelty-free formulas and post-consumer recyclable/reusable packaging,\" its website explains. \"We incorporate delicately extracted phyto-organic and natural ingredients to create Earth-friendly and skin-friendly products that are mother-nature approved.\" If you seem to be on a never-ending hunt for the perfect nontoxic skincare products like I am, you'll probably be glad you found this gem of a brand. This toner, in particular, boasts hyaluronic acid and caviar to hydrate, refresh, and replenish the skin's oxygen levels. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592443470910-main.1200x1754uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This toner helps make your skin suppler and more even-toned. Unlike other harsh alcohol toners, this one is great for sensitive skin because it's a lightweight formula. Nita switches back and forth between this toner and the two products listed directly above this. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592441958832-product.800x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Clearly, Nita loves the Pevonia Botanica brand, and this eye cream is no exception. Honestly, I hope to look half as good as her at age 89, so I might need to steal her entire vanity. This cream boasts green tea to neutralize free radicals, marine collagen to smooth wrinkles, and hyaluronic acid to plump your skin with moisture.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592442258280-main.2018x2809uc.jpg\"><figcaption>The product description for this states that it gives you a \"mini eyelift,\" which is definitely convincing for me. It's formulated with caviar extract, which helps with firmness and elasticity, while the brand's Cellular Complex \"uses cutting-edge biotechnological ingredients to help revitalize and energize at the cellular level.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592601763875-main.1500x1500uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This French brand is a favorite of Nita's, and we can definitely see why. This eye cream helps with puffiness, dark circles, and fine lines. It also helps boost circulation and strengthen capillaries. Plus, it has dozens of glowing reviews on Amazon, where shoppers say it's soothing, absorbs well, and works for sensitive skin. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592441075601-product.800x800uc.jpg\"><figcaption>As you can see in the photo of her skincare collection at the top of the story, Nita owns this cream and sings its praises because it helps firm up her skin. It's formulated with marine elastin, hyaluronic acid, and squalane to smooth and plump your skin. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592440878342-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>\"After we got back from [Erin Foster's] Nashville wedding [in December 2019], the girl who does my facials went to Paris and came back with some Sothys,\" Nita told Who What Wear. \"It's light and I really like it. I use their detoxing energizing serum in the morning and at night.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592516902598-image.1080x1080uc.jpg\"><figcaption>From left: Erin Foster, Sara Foster, Rebecca Dyer, and Nita Marshall </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592440903110-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>Another item in Nita's collection is this energizing serum from French brand Sothys that helps your skin look fresher and more awake. Who couldn't use that? </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592600710900-product.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>No skincare routine is complete without a sunscreen. This one is from Nita's beloved Pevonia Botanica brand and has earned rave reviews from shoppers who say it's lightweight, non-greasy, and hydrating. The formula has vitamin E to fight free radical damage, as well as green tea extract to hydrate and soothe your skin. Plus, reviewers say it doesn't make them breakout. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592442439181-main.800x0uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"Sometimes I use La Prairie's Firming Complex, and I use all of their Caviar line,\" she said. While expensive, the products have continually earned rave reviews for their ability to erase fine lines, increase elasticity, and smooth out skin texture thanks to antioxidants and La Prairie's proprietary formula. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592857381766-main.1000x1213uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Another standout product from Sothys, one of Nita's top-three favorite brands, is this Active Cream. It promises a lot for just $32—namely, it vows to dissolve blackheads, soften skin, and help build skin's resistance. One Amazon reviewer put it succinctly: \"In my experience, once you go Sothys you never go back.\"</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592861181026-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This lotion sops up excess oil and leaves skin balanced and hydrated thanks to grapefruit extract. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592442364918-main.2018x2809uc.jpg\"><figcaption>\"I use this sheer cream because my skin is so thin that I can't use anything heavy,\" she said. This powerful cream can gently exfoliate, firm up, and retexturize skin. \"La Prairie's breakthrough caviar science has enhanced natural caviar extract with bioengineered forms of the ingredient's most potent components for enhanced firmness and elasticity,\" the product description explains. In other words, it's basically a top-of-the-line facial in a jar. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/287824/anti-aging-products-287824-1592859348416-main.800x0uc.png\"><figcaption>This luxurious face oil is incredibly moisturizing yet non-greasy. 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"And Now, the Fall 2020 Boot Trend We've All Been Waiting For","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/xhnvU4XM7u8/flat-boot-trend","description":"<p>Now that we've made it through about half of the year in a socially distant, mask-wearing state, our perspectives have drastically shifted. We've begun to really contemplate what it is that makes us feel full as humans, what brings us joy, and how we can add value to our lives in a substantial way. Sartorially speaking, trends don't really seem to fit that bill. If you're an avid fashion person, sure, trends might bring you happiness and that is very valid, but from a practical standpoint, I think it's safe to assume any fashion journalist is wondering the same thing I am: <em>Is the trend cycle even relevant anymore?  </em></p><p>Personally, I love a good trend and identify with that fashion person above who seeks these new waves of innovation to feel excited by their closet, but this year, the world is different and so is my wardrobe. A big part of this movement toward basics and practicality and away from the frivolous <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/grunge-trend-fall-2020\" target=\"_blank\">trend cycle</a> includes a decline in the height of heels. This includes heeled boots as well. Luckily for us, the flattest boots possible graced the F/W 20 runways, proving that if one thing is going right sartorially this year, it's our fall footwear game.    </p><p>That's right, folks. The most practical and versatile boot trend just surfaced as one of the most popular styles on the runways. These low-to-the-ground soles will give you the excitement of a new trend while also providing a practical new addition to not only your seasonal wardrobe but also your assortment of timeless basics. From equestrian to Victorian-inspired styles, ahead, get ready to see some of the best flat <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/fall-boot-trends-2018\" target=\"_blank\">fall boots</a> on the runway, and shop an assortment of the best versions on the market thus far.  </p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597882375294-main.1200x900uc.gif\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>Confession: I might be just a little high-maintenance in the beauty department. As a beauty editor, I exist in a strange silo where meeting with <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/best-skin-tightening-routine\" target=\"_blank\">celebrity facialists</a> and getting a <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/what-is-lash-lift\" target=\"_blank\">lash-lift</a> at the office are all in a day's work. (Tough life, I know!) It wasn't until 2020 forced us all to slow down and stay home that I realized just how many beauty services I was partaking in on a regular basis. From <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/what-is-eyebrow-lamination\" target=\"_blank\">eyebrow lamination</a> to <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/bob-haircut-2019\" target=\"_blank\">haircuts</a> with celebrity stylists, I never really took stock of just how many beauty appointments were constantly on my calendar.</p><p>Then, the <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=CJPDluwFLMM5BpY8CLNxy7cDGhvgUSgWDY4OMlHE_lyrBSrthPgRDEx5n-U2W2-kJaAZz_ynzIoqcxwwG0xgyJmIsToGfV-AN8kjlhIQcqfeTqEgUvKIzdr1t2f8vtd7xjnG6BzAdfVlIRlIPMSIPJUemD7miUjjj1ZOrLirVqrN3EtboWsWVA1Q6A6wpgBLlmh6gyJaBusFhfHSoZI7L9TlSLvqKdaJl4V3FS-F4Ulo4rpCwR3zkvLO0Bb_B9qmhwCv1d_8bHLqRjzxtnknpbWqKDovDMj2c1UWJkeh8halQPiyjaltBSjo0EkxufAIcHLIGOH7huMNMQKf45ajPin6l4nAJWz-T0HrQ-fl8oXN1zE\" target=\"_blank\">Nordstrom Anniversary Sale</a> hit, and as I shopped through the pages, I started calculating just how many of the items had come in handy for me in place of my beloved salon services. Now, there's no comparing an at-home job to the real thing, but I've been holding it all together quite well if I do say so myself! All these deals are finally open to everyone, so it's the perfect time to browse for yourself and see about the face, hair, and body treatments you might be able to do yourself—and on the cheap. <strong>Now through August 30 is your chance to save up to 40% on the most beloved beauty buys.</strong></p><p>Ahead, check out all the on-sale items that have come in super handy and saved me hundreds compared to paying the professionals. Keep scrolling for everything you need to know.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597881940661-image.1024x1365uc.gif\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597874334423-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Every good facial starts with a thorough cleanse, and this classic face wash from Fresh is a go-to when I'm left to my own devices. It doesn't have any crazy actives that might irritate my skin before going in with even more targeted treatments, so it's the perfect one to use when re-creating a professional facial at home.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597882612489-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>If you've ever wondered what beauty editors talk about when no one else is around, it's products like this iconic exfoliator by Kate Sommerville. In all seriousness, I could screenshot at least 10 different exchanges between myself and my beauty cohort Erin Jahns about how much we love this stuff. When I'm carrying out an at-home facial, this is one of the exfoliators I'm always reaching for.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597875299929-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I've yet to make it to NYC for a facial with the esteemed skin guru herself, but this set by Dr. Barbara Sturm contains minis of all the most beloved anti-aging serums from her skincare line. For now, I'll be patting these elixirs into my face and pretending like I'm getting blessed by the expert.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597882811929-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>Dermaplaning is another custom facial add-on I like to indulge in from time to time to remove dead skin cells and unwanted peach fuzz from my face. This handy device lets me do it at home! Afterward, my skin always looks so fresh and radiant.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597876709304-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>This mascara is among my favorites for lifting and separating my lashes, which are some of the effects I like best about getting lash-lifts. To fake it, I simply layer on this primer and mascara and gently take it off with the accompanying eye makeup remover.</figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597877343408-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>I don't know about you, but this duo of brow products is all I need to keep my arches looking fluffy and snatched whether they're laminated or not. </figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288700/best-at-home-beauty-items-288700-1597878090398-main.1200x1200uc.jpg\"><figcaption>If you've been toying with the idea of indulging in some La Mer, now is the time. 10:13:01","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 10:13:01","title":"I'm in My 50s, and These Are the 5 Places I Always Shop","link":"http://feeds.whowhatwear.com/~r/WhoWhatWear/~3/Nt8j_F6Krjg/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s","description":"<p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951056510-main.1200x900uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p>There’s no doubt that our style evolves as we get older. By the time you’re in your 50s, you have the wisdom to know what pieces work for your lifestyle, career, body, and personal taste. There’s a confidence that lies in an over-50 woman's wardrobe—you don’t force yourself to wear trends that don’t work for you, and by now you’ve built a reliable <a class=\"link link--story\" href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/work-from-home-capsule-wardrobe\" target=\"_blank\">capsule wardrobe</a> that consists of timeless <a class=\"link link--story\" href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/wardrobe-essentials-nordstrom\" target=\"_blank\">staples</a> along with powerful statement pieces. Eager to find out where stylish women in their 50s shop to create said reliable wardrobe, I tapped into one fashion-forward woman's wardrobe who I love to follow on Instagram for her chic style: <a href=\"https://www.whowhatwear.com/ext?tl=0i4BLbbGMqZOquA0SAGJeRH06kSxid98AmUOLZZLY_tLsnlkR6rUR7M_4kHi-Vz3FNge\" target=\"_blank\">Renata Jaz</a>. Below, she's sharing the retailers, stores, and boutiques she loves to shop for classic and trending pieces alike, along with some of her current must-haves from each store. Read on to get inspired by her picks.</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597950511563-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951167024-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951166537-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951167297-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951168157-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><strong>Good for: </strong>Blazers and suiting</p><p>\"I’m a big fan of Frankie Shop. Their online store is amazing, and whenever I’m in Paris I always visit their flag store! I love high-quality suits and blazers which I could wear for years and they never go out of style, and that’s exactly what I can find in Frankie Shop. Beautiful suits and blazers, perfectly tailored, and very easy to style.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951546531-main.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><strong>Good for: </strong>Knits</p><p>\"British weather favors sweaters. Living in England means that I wear knits all year round, and my wardrobe is full of them. Therefore, whenever I buy them I pay attention to their quality... I love cashmere knits as their quality is always amazing, which means that I can wear them for years.  Because I wear knits pretty much all the time I’m not afraid to pay a bit more something beautifully made and one of a kind. Net-a-porter and Farfetch are perfect for this kind of purchase.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951646332-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951404180-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951501050-main.2000x3000uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951589507-main.2000x3001uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597950435782-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><strong>Good for:</strong> Minimalistic elements</p><p>\"Minimalistic coats, dresses, and shorts are in fashion right now. They are easy and comfy to wear. I love wearing green minimalistic pieces and add fun a fun bag and shoes. Whenever I looking for minimalistic pieces I tend to go to COS. They are affordable and their designs are absolutely amazing!\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597953233439-main.975x1463uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597953238498-main.975x1463uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597953243756-main.975x1463uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597953267037-main.975x1463uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597950434205-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951994933-main.1920x2880uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597952064645-main.1920x2880uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597951994774-main.1920x2880uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597952115899-main.1920x2880uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><strong>Good for: </strong>Basics and denim</p><p>\"My go-to store when looking for basics (e.g white racer tops and t-shirts) and jeans is Zara. Their tops are always good quality and affordable, so I often buy the same top in 3 or 4 different colors. And when it comes to jeans, they have a great range from; simple denim jeans to more trendy ones.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597950431961-image.850x1275uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><strong>Good for: </strong>Shoes and bags</p><p>\"Shoes and bags are my essentials! I have a habit of creating my outfit from bottom to top, so I start with shoes and bags and build my outfit around them. Hence I believe in investing a bit more in shoes and bags. I also think that they can make any outfit more unique. My favourite place to shop shoes and bags is Luisa Via Roma, their selection is always up to date. Whether you are looking for party heels and statement bags to summer slides and classic pouches. You can find there the most desired pieces.\"</p><p><figure><img src=\"https://cdn.cliqueinc.com/posts/288732/best-places-to-shop-for-clothes-in-your-50s-288732-1597952374113-main.850x967uc.jpg\"><figcaption></figcaption></figure></p><p><figure><img
